programme.title: Cute Animals & Christmas Panels
programme.desc: Debbi Moore brings us another brand new collection - Cute Owls, alongside some best selling Christmas panels.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Betrayed by her evil sister Ravenna, heartbroken Freya retreats to a northern kingdom to raise an army of huntsmen as her protectors. Gifted with the ability to freeze her enemies in ice, Freya teaches her young soldiers to never fall in love. When Eric and fellow warrior Sara defy this rule, the angry queen does whatever she can to stop them. As war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara try to end Ravenna's wicked reign.

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: In this version of the classic story - based on the smash Broadway musical - Dorothy is a shy 24-year-old Harlem kindergarten teacher who is brought by a snowstorm to the mysterious Land of Oz, a sprawling, decaying, nightmarish, and dangerous megalopolis that resembles the physical characteristics of New York City.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers: Milady
programme.desc: Constance Bonacieux is kidnapped before D'Artagnan's very eyes. In a frantic quest to save her, the young musketeer, aided by Athos, Porthos and Aramis, is forced to join forces with the mysterious Milady de Winter.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: Hook
programme.desc: Grown-up Peter Pan has to return to Neverland to rediscover his true identity in order to rescue his children from the clutches of the evil Captain Hook. Peter has grown up into a workaholic executive but takes time off for a holiday in London. Once there, his children are kidnapped by Hook, and Peter must throw off his corporate image and go back to Neverland to save his children.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Betrayed by her evil sister Ravenna, heartbroken Freya retreats to a northern kingdom to raise an army of huntsmen as her protectors. Gifted with the ability to freeze her enemies in ice, Freya teaches her young soldiers to never fall in love. When Eric and fellow warrior Sara defy this rule, the angry queen does whatever she can to stop them. As war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara try to end Ravenna's wicked reign.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: Yogi, Boo Boo and Ranger Smith team up to try to stop the mayor from closing Jellystone Park and selling it to loggers.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit and his three sisters -- Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton-Tail -- enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregor's vegetable garden. When one of McGregor's relatives suddenly moves in, he's less than thrilled to discover a family of rabbits in his new home. A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
programme.desc: A young farmhand gets swept into the realm of legend when he must defend his land from a seemingly unstoppable force of giant warriors.

programme.title: Snow White & the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Bart's successful stage musical based on Dickens's tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncle's creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncle's secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them', which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: A Tiger's Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from poachers who killed the animal's mother. The two head to the Taktsang monastery in Buthan, known as "The Tiger's Nest".

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: Yogi, Boo Boo and Ranger Smith team up to try to stop the mayor from closing Jellystone Park and selling it to loggers.

programme.title: Jack the Giant Slayer
programme.desc: A young farmhand gets swept into the realm of legend when he must defend his land from a seemingly unstoppable force of giant warriors.

programme.title: Oliver!
programme.desc: Endearing film version of Lionel Bart's successful stage musical based on Dickens's tale of the fluctuating fortunes of an orphan boy. Ron Moody stands out as the wily old scrounger Fagin in a series of well-crafted set-pieces and atmospheric musical numbers, and a tribe of child stars brings the 19th-century London underworld vividly to life.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncle's creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncle's secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them', which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit and his three sisters -- Flopsy, Mopsy and Cotton-Tail -- enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregor's vegetable garden. When one of McGregor's relatives suddenly moves in, he's less than thrilled to discover a family of rabbits in his new home. A battle of wills soon breaks out as the new owner hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a resourceful rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house while their mum is at work.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred's being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college friends decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends. One of them has a rival for the affections of his girlfriend as she is hit on by a wealthy playboy.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Betrayed by her evil sister Ravenna, heartbroken Freya retreats to a northern kingdom to raise an army of huntsmen as her protectors. Gifted with the ability to freeze her enemies in ice, Freya teaches her young soldiers to never fall in love. When Eric and fellow warrior Sara defy this rule, the angry queen does whatever she can to stop them. As war between the siblings escalates, Eric and Sara try to end Ravenna's wicked reign.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house while their mum is at work.

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prehistoric prequel in which working-class college friends decide to set off for a fun weekend in Rock Vegas with their two new girlfriends. One of them has a rival for the affections of his girlfriend as she is hit on by a wealthy playboy.

programme.title: The Portable Door
programme.desc: A man lands an internship at a mysterious London firm with unconventional employees, including the charismatic CEO who is incorporating modern corporate strategy into ancient magical practices.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred's being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Elizabeth II and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: A New York couple go to an orphanage to adopt a brother for their only son, but instead come away with a little mouse. On arrival at his new home, the diminutive rodent receives a lukewarm welcome by the boy - and an even frostier reception from the pet cat. Featuring a mixture of live action and animation.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the children's story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesn't go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: Snow White & the Huntsman
programme.desc: In a twist to the fairy tale, the Huntsman ordered to take Snow White into the woods to be killed winds up becoming her protector and mentor in a quest to vanquish the Evil Queen.

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Raised outside of her Māori culture, tween Sam sets out on a mission with two other misfits to reconnect with her tupuna: Taranaki Maunga. Together, the three go on an unconventional journey and discover the power of friendship.

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Elizabeth II and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the children's story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Robin and the Hoods
programme.desc: The Hoods are a group of kids who love to play fantasy games on a patch of land they call the kingdom. However, when plans emerge to develop the area into a leisure facility, they must find a way to save their beloved playground before it's too late.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: A thrilling modern day take on Charles Dickens' novel, `Oliver Twist', as a gang of street hustlers plan the heist of the century.

programme.title: The Mountain
programme.desc: Raised outside of her Māori culture, tween Sam sets out on a mission with two other misfits to reconnect with her tupuna: Taranaki Maunga. Together, the three go on an unconventional journey and discover the power of friendship.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A spiritualist medium holds a séance for a writer suffering from writers block but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife which leads to an increasingly complex love triangle with his current wife of five years.

programme.title: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats' leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything they've faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncle's creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncle's secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them', which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Fred's being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Washed-up stuntman Luo seeks help from his estranged daughter and her lawyer boyfriend when his beloved stunt horse may be auctioned off to pay his debts. Luo and Red Hare become a media sensation when their fight with debt collectors goes viral.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: There's trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptune's crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBob's boss, is the culprit. Though he's just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krab's life.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: Fibs, pranks and manoeuvres take centre stage amid a 14-year-old habitual liar's bizarre confrontation with an obnoxious filmmaker who is in dire need of a blockbuster.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Magical Movies
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: A thrilling modern day take on Charles Dickens' novel, `Oliver Twist', as a gang of street hustlers plan the heist of the century.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A spiritualist medium holds a séance for a writer suffering from writers block but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife which leads to an increasingly complex love triangle with his current wife of five years.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: While investigating a strange murder, Sam and Dean discover the killer has the same tattoo as those from the Styne family; Castiel plays referee when Charlie and Rowena must work together; Crowley turns to an old enemy for help with Rowena.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean takes matters into his own hands regarding Stynes; Sam attempts to come to terms with his decision.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: It's been nearly two years since Superman's (Henry Cavill) colossal battle with Zod (Michael Shannon) devastated the city of Metropolis. The loss of life and collateral damage left many feeling angry and helpless, including crime-fighting billionaire Bruce Wayne (Ben Affleck). Convinced that Superman is now a threat to humanity, Batman embarks on a personal vendetta to end his reign on Earth, while the conniving Lex Luthor (Jesse Eisenberg) launches his own crusade against the Man of Steel.

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
programme.desc: Peter Quill and his fellow Guardians are hired by a powerful alien race, the Sovereign, to protect their precious batteries from invaders. When it is discovered that Rocket has stolen the items they were sent to guard, the Sovereign dispatch their armada to search for vengeance. As the Guardians try to escape, the mystery of Peter's parentage is revealed.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: Lt. Alex Hopper (Taylor Kitsch) is a weapons officer aboard the destroyer USS John Paul Jones, while his older brother, Stone (Alexander Skarsgård), is the commanding officer of the USS Sampson. Unknown to Alex, Stone or the rest of the U.S. Navy, alien invaders have arrived on Earth with plans to steal Earth's resources. When a confrontation with the invaders knocks out the Navy's radar capability, American and Japanese forces must work together to find a way to save the planet.

programme.title: Blue Beetle
programme.desc: Jaime Reyes suddenly finds himself in possession of an ancient relic of alien biotechnology called the Scarab. When the Scarab chooses Jaime to be its symbiotic host, he's bestowed with an incredible suit of armor that's capable of extraordinary and unpredictable powers, forever changing his destiny as he becomes the superhero Blue Beetle.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The case of two teens who killed themselves after a murderous rampage at a mall in 1995 reopens when evidence indicates there may have been a third shooter.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: A 2004 case involving the disappearance of a female war veteran reopens when her prosthetic arm is found in a river.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The detectives must solve the 20-year-old case of a 6-year-old boy's rape and murder.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The team takes on the high-stakes world of high-school cheerleading when an anonymous confession to a teen girl's murder turns up at an art exhibit.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Paige feels out of place among her happily married older sisters and their spouses, plus she becomes convinced Cole is a demon.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: After six decades of searching, two wrathful wraiths who fought alongside Leo during World War II track him down to exact revenge.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A vampire queen (Elizabeth Gracen) orders minions to convert Paige in order to shift the balance of power before trying to unseat Cole as ruler of the Underworld.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Piper and Paige help a wizard (Armin Shimerman) stop the coronation of a new Source, unaware that Cole is the new leader of the Underworld.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean comes to a stunning decision that will alter his life -- as well as Sam's; Rowena and Crowley face off, putting Castiel in the middle.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Dean and Sam are faced with their biggest threat: the darkness that has been unleashed; Castiel experiences the impact of Rowena's spell and remembers his battle with Crowley.

programme.title: Supernatural
programme.desc: Jenna winds up in a dangerous situation and calls Dean for help, leaving Sam to deal with monsters on his own.

programme.title: Overboard
programme.desc: Kate is a single, working-class mother of three who's hired to clean a luxury yacht that belongs to Leonardo -- a selfish, spoiled and wealthy Mexican playboy. After unjustly firing Kate, Leonardo falls off the boat and wakes up with no memory of who he is. To get payback, Kate shows up at the hospital and convinces the confused amnesiac that they're married. As Leonardo tries to get used to manual labor and his new family, Kate starts to wonder how long she can keep fooling her fake husband.

programme.title: Maid in Manhattan
programme.desc: The story of Marisa Ventura (Jennifer Lopez), a single mother born and bred in the boroughs of New York City, who works as a maid in a first-class Manhattan hotel. By a twist of fate and mistaken identity, Marisa meets Christopher Marshall (Ralph Fiennes), heir to a political dynasty, who believes that she is a guest at the hotel. Fate steps in and throws the pair together for a magical night of romance. When Marisa's true identity is revealed, the two find that they are worlds apart.

programme.title: Barbie
programme.desc: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land. However, when they get a chance to go to the real world, they soon discover the joys and perils of living among humans.

programme.title: Wonka
programme.desc: Armed with nothing but a hatful of dreams, young chocolatier Willy Wonka manages to change the world, one delectable bite at a time.

programme.title: Cold Case

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When queen-to-be Phoebe rejoins her sisters to save an innocent, the denizens of the Underworld threaten a coup unless the witch proves her dark allegiance by killing Piper and Paige.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: As Phoebe's unborn child shows signs of demonic powers, the Seer (Debbi Morgan) plots to steal the baby and bring it to term.

programme.desc: The Angel of Destiny offers the sisters a chance to relinquish their powers and lead normal lives as a reward for vanquishing the Source of All Evil.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When the Charmed Ones decide to help a mermaid who needs a proclamation of love from her mortal boyfriend, they botch a spell and turn Phoebe into a mermaid.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: A siren (Melinda Clarke) captivates Cole while endangering Phoebe's life; Piper and Leo's unborn baby plays a trick on them.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: When a boy's rendering of a demon comes to life, the young artist draws the Charmed Ones as comic-book heroes to combat the demon.

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: Phoebe consults a fortune teller and discovers that a demon is stealing Gypsies' eyes to reverse a curse put on his father.

programme.title: The Flash
programme.desc: Worlds collide when the Flash uses his superpowers to travel back in time to change the events of the past. However, when his attempt to save his family inadvertently alters the future, he becomes trapped in a reality in which General Zod has returned, threatening annihilation. With no other superheroes to turn to, the Flash looks to coax a very different Batman out of retirement and rescue an imprisoned Kryptonian -- albeit not the one he's looking for.

programme.desc: Wayne Gretzky, Liam McHugh, Anson Carter, and Paul Bissonnette present pregame coverage.

programme.title: Live: NHL Hockey
programme.desc: Alex Ovechkin returns for his 21st NHL season as his Capitals open things up by facing the Bruins. Ovechkin became the league's all-time leader scorer last campaign, with 44 goals bring his career number to 897, three more than Wayne Gretzky.

programme.title: Live: NHL Hockey

programme.title: Charmed
programme.desc: The sisters' nightmares spring to life, and they can escape only by unveiling the symbolic meaning of their dreams.

programme.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
programme.desc: It's been nearly two years since Superman's (Henry Cavill) colossal battle with Zod (Michael Shannon) devastated the city of Metropolis. The loss of life and collateral damage left many feeling angry and helpless, including crime-fighting billionaire Bruce Wayne (Ben Affleck). Convinced that Superman is now a threat to humanity, Batman embarks on a personal vendetta to end his reign on Earth, while the conniving Lex Luthor (Jesse Eisenberg) launches his own crusade against the Man of Steel.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: When an asteroid threatens to collide with Earth, NASA honcho Dan Truman (Billy Bob Thornton) determines the only way to stop it is to drill into its surface and detonate a nuclear bomb. This leads him to renowned driller Harry Stamper (Bruce Willis), who agrees to helm the dangerous space mission provided he can bring along his own hotshot crew. Among them is the cocksure A.J. (Ben Affleck), who Harry thinks isn't good enough for his daughter (Liv Tyler), until the mission proves otherwise.

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: After making a speech in Moscow vowing to never negotiate with terrorists, President James Marshall boards Air Force One with his family and advisers. When a group of terrorists led by Ivan Korshunov hijacks the flight, the President's principles are put to the test. Feigning escape, ex-solider Marshall stows away in the aircraft and must race against time to rescue his family and everyone else on board.

programme.title: Enemy of the State
programme.desc: Corrupt National Security Agency official Thomas Reynolds (Jon Voight) has a congressman assassinated to assure the passage of expansive new surveillance legislation. When a videotape of the murder ends up in the hands of Robert Clayton Dean (Will Smith), a labor lawyer and dedicated family man, he is framed for murder. With the help of ex-intelligence agent Edward "Brill" Lyle (Gene Hackman), Dean attempts to throw Reynolds off his trail and prove his innocence.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
programme.desc: Adaptation of the first of J.K. Rowling's popular children's novels about Harry Potter, a boy who learns on his eleventh birthday that he is the orphaned son of two powerful wizards and possesses unique magical powers of his own. He is summoned from his life as an unwanted child to become a student at Hogwarts, an English boarding school for wizards. There, he meets several friends who become his closest allies and help him discover the truth about his parents' mysterious deaths.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The follow-up to "Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone" finds young wizard Harry Potterand his friends, Ron and Hermione, facing new challenges during their second year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry as they try to discover a dark force that is terrorizing the school.

programme.title: M3GAN
programme.desc: M3GAN is a marvel of artificial intelligence, a lifelike doll that's programmed to be a child's greatest companion and a parent's greatest ally. Designed by Gemma, a brilliant roboticist, M3GAN can listen, watch and learn as it plays the role of friend and teacher, playmate and protector. When Gemma becomes the unexpected caretaker of her 8-year-old niece, she decides to give the girl a M3GAN prototype, a decision that leads to unimaginable consequences.

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: After moving to a new city, young Andy Barclay receives a special present from his mother -- a seemingly innocent Buddi doll that becomes his best friend. When the doll suddenly takes on a life of its own, Andy unites with other neighborhood children to stop the sinister toy from wreaking bloody havoc.

programme.title: The Prodigy
programme.desc: Sarah and John Blume are thrilled when their young son Miles starts to show signs of rapid development and extreme intelligence. Their family bliss soon turns into a living nightmare when Miles' behavior becomes increasingly erratic and violent by his eighth birthday. After seeking help from two experts, Sarah is horrified to learn that her beloved prodigy may be under the grip of a dark and supernatural force.

programme.title: The Quiet Ones
programme.desc: An unorthodox college professor leads his best students off the grid to perform a dangerous experiment to create a poltergeist. Operating under the theory that paranormal activity is triggered by negative human energy, the group uses a series of tests to push a young woman to the edge of sanity. Frightening occurrences with unspeakable consequences subsequently unfold, leading the researchers to the realization that they have unleashed a force more terrifying than they could have imagined.

programme.title: You're Next
programme.desc: The Davisons, an upper-class family, are extremely wealthy -- but also estranged. In an attempt to mend their broken family ties, Aubrey (Barbara Crampton) and Paul (Rob Moran) Davison decide to celebrate their wedding anniversary by inviting their four children and their children's significant others to their weekend estate. The celebration gets off to a rocky start, but when crossbow-wielding assailants in animal masks suddenly attack, the Davisons must pull together or die.

programme.title: The Quiet Ones
programme.desc: An unorthodox college professor leads his best students off the grid to perform a dangerous experiment to create a poltergeist. Operating under the theory that paranormal activity is triggered by negative human energy, the group uses a series of tests to push a young woman to the edge of sanity. Frightening occurrences with unspeakable consequences subsequently unfold, leading the researchers to the realization that they have unleashed a force more terrifying than they could have imagined.

programme.title: The Turning
programme.desc: Kate Mandell takes a job as a nanny for two young orphans at an isolated Gothic mansion in the Maine countryside. She soon learns that the children -- Miles and Flora -- are emotionally distant and unstable. When strange events start to plague Kate and the siblings, she begins to suspect that the estate's dark corridors are home to a malevolent entity.

programme.title: Leatherface
programme.desc: A teenage Leatherface escapes from a mental hospital with three other inmates, kidnapping a young nurse and taking her on a road trip from hell, while being pursued by a lawman out for revenge.

programme.title: Knock at the Cabin
programme.desc: While vacationing at a remote cabin in the woods, a young girl and her parents are taken hostage by four armed strangers who demand they make an unthinkable choice to avert the apocalypse. Confused, scared and with limited access to the outside world, the family must decide what they believe before all is lost.

programme.title: Violent Night
programme.desc: An elite team of mercenaries breaks into a family compound on Christmas Eve, taking everyone hostage inside. However, they aren't prepared for a surprise combatant: Santa Claus is on the grounds, and he's about to show why this Nick is no saint.

programme.title: Halloween Ends
programme.desc: Four years after her last encounter with masked killer Michael Myers, Laurie Strode is living with her granddaughter and trying to finish her memoir. Myers hasn't been seen since, and Laurie finally decides to liberate herself from rage and fear and embrace life. However, when a young man stands accused of killing a boy that he was babysitting, it ignites a cascade of violence and terror that forces Laurie to confront the evil she can't control.

programme.title: Leatherface
programme.desc: A teenage Leatherface escapes from a mental hospital with three other inmates, kidnapping a young nurse and taking her on a road trip from hell, while being pursued by a lawman out for revenge.

programme.title: Stillwater
programme.desc: An American oil-rig roughneck travels to Marseille, France, to visit his estranged daughter, in prison for a murder she claims she didn't commit. Confronted with language barriers, cultural differences and a complicated legal system, he soon builds a new life for himself as he makes it his personal mission to exonerate her.

programme.title: The Craft: Legacy
programme.desc: An eclectic foursome of aspiring teenage witches get more than they bargained for as they lean into their newfound powers.

programme.title: Knock at the Cabin
programme.desc: While vacationing at a remote cabin in the woods, a young girl and her parents are taken hostage by four armed strangers who demand they make an unthinkable choice to avert the apocalypse. Confused, scared and with limited access to the outside world, the family must decide what they believe before all is lost.

programme.title: Happy Death Day
programme.desc: Tree Gelbman is a blissfully self-centered collegian who wakes up on her birthday in the bed of a student named Carter. As the morning goes on, Tree gets the eerie feeling that she's experienced the events of this day before. When a masked killer suddenly takes her life in a brutal attack, she once again magically wakes up in Carter's dorm room unharmed. Now, the frightened young woman must relive the same day over and over until she figures out who murdered her.

programme.title: Happy Death Day 2U
programme.desc: Collegian Tree Gelbman wakes up in horror to learn that she's stuck in a parallel universe. Her boyfriend Carter is now with someone else, and her friends and fellow students seem to be completely different versions of themselves. When Tree discovers that Carter's roommate has been altering time, she finds herself once again the target of a masked killer. When the psychopath starts to go after her inner circle, Tree soon realizes that she must die over and over again to save everyone.

programme.title: The Purge: Anarchy
programme.desc: One night per year, the government sanctions a 12-hour period in which citizens can commit any crime they wish -- including murder -- without fear of punishment or imprisonment. Leo, a sergeant who lost his son, plans a vigilante mission of revenge during the mayhem. However, instead of a death-dealing avenger, he becomes the unexpected protector of four innocent strangers who desperately need his help if they are to survive the night.

programme.title: Violent Night

programme.title: The Craft: Legacy
programme.desc: An eclectic foursome of aspiring teenage witches get more than they bargained for as they lean into their newfound powers.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: Upset about moving from the big city to a small town, young Zach Cooper (Dylan Minnette) finds a silver lining when he meets his beautiful neighbor Hannah (Odeya Rush). The teen is surprised to learn that Hannah's mysterious father is R.L. Stine (Jack Black), the famous author of the best-selling "Goosebumps" series. When Zach accidentally unleashes the monsters from the fantastic tales, it's up to Stine, his daughter and Cooper to return the beasts back to the books where they belong.

programme.title: Happy Death Day 2U
programme.desc: Collegian Tree Gelbman wakes up in horror to learn that she's stuck in a parallel universe. Her boyfriend Carter is now with someone else, and her friends and fellow students seem to be completely different versions of themselves. When Tree discovers that Carter's roommate has been altering time, she finds herself once again the target of a masked killer. When the psychopath starts to go after her inner circle, Tree soon realizes that she must die over and over again to save everyone.

programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: Found video footage tells the tale of three film students (Heather Donahue, Joshua Leonard, Michael C. Williams) who've traveled to a small town to collect documentary footage about the Blair Witch, a legendary local murderer. Over the course of several days, the students interview townspeople and gather clues to support the tale's veracity. But the project takes a frightening turn when the students lose their way in the woods and begin hearing horrific noises.

programme.title: Drag Me to Hell
programme.desc: Christine Brown has a loving boyfriend and a good job at a Los Angeles bank. Her heavenly life becomes hellish when, in an effort to impress her boss, she denies an old woman's request for an extension on her home loan. In retaliation, the crone places a curse on Christine, threatening her soul with eternal damnation. Christine seeks a psychic's help to break the curse, but the price to save her soul may be more than she can pay.

programme.title: Silent House
programme.desc: Sarah (Elizabeth Olsen) is working with her father (Adam Trese) and uncle (Eric Sheffer Stevens) to renovate an old family home to prepare it for sale. Long vacant, the house has no utilities, forcing the trio to rely on battery-operated lanterns to light their way. Sarah becomes separated from her relatives and soon finds she is trapped inside the cabin, with no contact with the outside world. Panic turns to real terror as the young woman experiences events that become increasingly ominous.

programme.title: Brightburn
programme.desc: After a difficult struggle with fertility, Tori Breyer's dreams of motherhood come true with the arrival of a mysterious baby boy. Brandon appears to be everything Tori and her husband, Kyle, ever wanted -- bright, talented and curious about the world. But as Brandon nears puberty, powerful darkness manifests within him, and Tori becomes consumed by terrible doubts about her son. Once Brandon begins to act on his twisted urges, those closest to him find themselves in grave danger.

programme.title: Nope
programme.desc: A man and his sister discover something sinister in the skies above their California horse ranch, while the owner of a nearby theme park tries to profit from the mysterious, otherworldly phenomenon.

programme.title: The Avengers
programme.desc: When Thor's evil brother, Loki (Tom Hiddleston), gains access to the unlimited power of the energy cube called the Tesseract, Nick Fury (Samuel L. Jackson), director of S.H.I.E.L.D., initiates a superhero recruitment effort to defeat the unprecedented threat to Earth. Joining Fury's "dream team" are Iron Man (Robert Downey Jr.), Captain America (Chris Evans), the Hulk (Mark Ruffalo), Thor (Chris Hemsworth), the Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson) and Hawkeye (Jeremy Renner).

Also featured is music from the Shadow Mountain Community Church Choir and Orchestra, as well as performances by musical guests that have included Steve Green and Charles Billingsley. Men and women who have been impacted by the Turning Point ministry also share their stories with viewers. During the month of December, "Turning Point" usually features special Christmas programming.

programme.desc: James Robison is a former preacher who changed directions in his life several years ago and began hosting this television show alongside his wife, Betty, in order to reach out to help more people. programme.desc: An action movie star must protect baby pandas from a group of mercenaries.

programme.title: Love Hurts

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane
programme.desc: A woman discovers the horrifying truth about the outside world while living in an underground shelter with two men.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: A group of misguided animal rights activists free a caged chimp infected with the 'Rage' virus from a medical research lab. When London bike courier Jim wakes up from a coma a month after, he finds his city all but deserted. On the run from the zombie-like victims of the Rage, Jim stumbles upon a group of survivors, including Selena and cab driver Frank, and joins them on a perilous journey to what he hopes will be safety.

programme.title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: The T-virus unleashed by the evil Umbrella Corporation has spread to every corner of the globe, infesting the planet with zombies, demons and monsters. Alice, a former Umbrella employee turned rogue warrior, joins her friends on a last-chance mission to storm the company's headquarters located deep underneath what used to be Raccoon City. But the Red Queen knows that Alice is coming, and the final battle will determine if the rest of mankind lives or dies.

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Members of an odd police force chase monstrous spirits who try to escape their final judgement by hiding among the living. When the lawmen uncover a plot that could end all life, they must restore the cosmic balance.

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man
programme.desc: Visually arresting thriller about a researcher who uses a mentally disabled gardener for ill-advised experiments in inducing mental development through virtual reality simulations. At first, the simulations seem to enhance the lawnmower man's mental powers, but then the experiment goes haywire. Based on a short story by Stephen King.

programme.title: Unhinged
programme.desc: A mother leans on her horn at the wrong time, to the wrong guy. Road rage doesn't begin to describe what he's about to do to her and everyone she knows.

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Liberty's head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.title: 57 Seconds
programme.desc: A tech blogger unleashes the power of a time-altering device to rewrite the past and seek revenge against the ruthless corporate empire that destroyed his family.

programme.title: 10 Cloverfield Lane

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Dr Ryan Stone and Matt Kowalsky are stranded in space with no way to contact Earth after their shuttle is destroyed in the midst of a routine space walk.

programme.title: Godzilla
programme.desc: Ford Brody, a Navy bomb expert, has just reunited with his family in San Francisco, only to be forced to go to Japan to help his estranged father, Joe. Soon, both men are swept up in an escalating crisis when Godzilla, King of the Monsters, arises from the sea to combat malevolent adversaries that threaten the survival of humanity. The creatures leave colossal destruction in their wake as they make their way towards their final battleground back in San Francisco.

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Repo Man
programme.desc: Bud is a repo man - his job is to hunt down and re-possess cars on which the owner's payment is overdue. Sometimes dirty, sometimes dangerous, usually drug-fuelled, he takes on Otto Maddox as an apprentice and starts teaching him the tricks of the trade. Then the call for the big job goes out - $20,000 to the first to track down a 1964 Chevy Malibu. Suddenly every repo man in the city is on the case - as are government agents.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers unite to explore a mythical, uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. Cut off from everything they know, they venture into the domain of the mighty Kong, igniting the ultimate battle between man and nature. As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss' Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth'. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: A group of scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal them. Only one man survives. He has two aims: to find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process can't be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Repo Men
programme.desc: It's the year 2025 and an enormous corporation known as The Union has revolutionised the medical world by creating artificial human organs. The only problem is that those benefiting from transplants find themselves heavily in dept with the ruthless company and if the steep bills aren't paid so-called repo men are sent in to collect.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sant's remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcock's day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

Trying to track down the makers, he enters a world of extreme sex and violence in one of David Cronenberg's early films that, while explicit, also satirises the media industry and its attempts at mind-control.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process can't be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Gothika
programme.desc: A strange car accident leaves criminal psychiatrist Miranda with amnesia and locked up in her own prison, accused of murdering her own husband, the director of the hospital. Haunted by terrifying spirits, she must escape to save her sanity.

programme.title: Little Bone Lodge
programme.desc: During a vicious storm, two criminal brothers on the run seek refuge in a desolate farmhouse. Taking the resident family captive, they discover that the house holds dark secrets of its own.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the house's secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.title: Salem's Lot
programme.desc: A writer returns to his hometown and discovers that the residents are being turned into vampires.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British family's idyllic country estate.

programme.title: Salem's Lot
programme.desc: A writer returns to his hometown and discovers that the residents are being turned into vampires.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: A true-crime writer finds a cache of 8 mm `snuff' films that suggest the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose career dates back to the 1960s.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the town's children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British family's idyllic country estate.

programme.title: Bram Stoker's Dracula
programme.desc: Count Dracula, a 15th-century prince, is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. Young lawyer Jonathan Harker is sent to Dracula's castle to finalise a land deal, but when the Count sees a photo of Harker's fiancée, Mina, the spitting image of his dead wife, he imprisons him and sets off for London to track her down.

programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.title: Cinema List: Thrilling Thriller
programme.desc: Send your heart racing with these masterful thrillers creating tension so thick you could cut it, from 70s hit `The China Syndrome' to M Night Shyamalan's 2024 blockbuster `Trap'.

programme.title: Zombieland: Double Tap
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic warriors must rely on their wits and weapons more than ever as they find themselves in a relentless battle against smarter, faster and seemingly indestructible zombies.

programme.title: Out of Darkness
programme.desc: A desperate band of early humans finds a new land to settle in some 45,000 years ago. As they start to realise that something monstrous is hunting them down, they must confront a horrifying danger that they never could have imagined.

programme.title: IT
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the town's children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A lieutenant general and a colonel face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Contraband
programme.desc: To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken family's history.

programme.title: A Place Called Silence
programme.desc: Chen Yutong, a girl's middle school student, was bullied at school, but her mother Li Han was unable to save her daughter from the "hell." Everyone around her turned a blind eye, and a collective silence brewed greater violence.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nester's mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: A Secret Service agent is taunted by calls from a would-be killer who has detailed information about the agent - including the fact that he failed to save President John F Kennedy from assassination. The caller is revealed as an ex-CIA assassin, and the agent, who is investigating a threat to the current president, is determined not to let history repeat itself.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, a Harvard symbologist is surprised to be approached by the Pope's emissaries for help. Following the Pope's recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiff's place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A lieutenant general and a colonel face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: Ocean's 8
programme.desc: Debbie Ocean assembles an all-female team of thieves and specialists for a heist during the Met Gala, aiming for the $150 million worth of diamonds around the neck of world-famous actress Daphne Kluger.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if he'll live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nester's mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Rashomon
programme.desc: A heavy downpour surprises a priest, a woodcutter, and a servant, forcing them to seek protection from the water in a temple ruin. Previously, they witnessed a crime without knowing how it was committed.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, a Harvard symbologist is surprised to be approached by the Pope's emissaries for help. Following the Pope's recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiff's place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Ocean's 8
programme.desc: Debbie Ocean assembles an all-female team of thieves and specialists for a heist during the Met Gala, aiming for the $150 million worth of diamonds around the neck of world-famous actress Daphne Kluger.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who murdered five people, apparently at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of US soldiers.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a string of brutal murders terrorises London, it does not take long for legendary detective Sherlock Holmes and his crime-solving partner, Dr Watson, to find the killer, Lord Blackwood. A devotee of the dark arts, Blackwood has a bigger scheme in mind, and his execution plays right into his plans. The game is afoot when Blackwood seems to rise from the grave, plunging Holmes and Watson into the world of the occult and strange technologies.

programme.title: Detroit
programme.desc: As rioting and civil unrest rocks Detroit during the summer of 1967, several policemen begin interrogating guests at the Algiers Motel. By the end of the night, three unarmed men are gunned down while several others are brutally beaten.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: For Dan Gallagher, life is good. He is on the rise at his New York law firm, is happily married to his wife, Beth, and has a loving daughter. However, after a casual fling with a sultry book editor named Alex, everything changes. Jilted by Dan, Alex becomes unstable, her behaviour escalating from aggressive pursuit to obsessive stalking. Dan realises that his main problem is not hiding his affair, but rather saving himself and his family.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.title: Head Count
programme.desc: After escaping prison, Kat's own revolver is pointed to his head by an unknown assailant. As the empty rounds click away, he tries to remember what happened to each bullet.

programme.title: Mob Cops
programme.desc: When a retired NYPD detective writes a book about his family's ties to the mob, it ignites a firestorm between dirty cops working for a brutal crime boss and the officers trying to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Barber
programme.desc: A wealthy widow hires private investigator Val Barber to find her missing granddaughter. As dark secrets start to surface, Barber finds himself entangled with shady and powerful men who are determind to thwart his investigation.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sant's remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcock's day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.desc: Based on the true story of policeman Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD. Going beyond the call of duty, he is rewarded for his commitment.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austria's crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Ruthless
programme.desc: A high school coach hunts down the men responsible for an underground human trafficking operation.

programme.title: The F1 Show
programme.desc: The F1 Show positions itself at the centre of the Singapore Grand Prix, providing a sneak peek of the paddock and the personalities involved at the heart of the race.

programme.title: Insidious: The Last Key
programme.desc: Brilliant parapsychologist Elise Rainier receives a disturbing phone call from a man who claims that his house is haunted. Even more disturbing is the address -- 413 Apple Tree Lane in Five Keys, N.M. -- the home where Elise grew up as a child. Accompanied by her two investigative partners, Rainier travels to Five Keys to confront and destroy her greatest fear -- the demon that she accidentally set free years earlier.

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods
programme.desc: When five college friends (Kristen Connolly, Chris Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison, Fran Kranz, Jesse Williams) arrive at a remote forest cabin for a little vacation, little do they expect the horrors that await them. One by one, the youths fall victim to backwoods zombies, but there is another factor at play. Two scientists (Richard Jenkins, Bradley Whitford) are manipulating the ghoulish goings-on, but even as the body count rises, there is yet more at work than meets the eye.

programme.title: House of Wax
programme.desc: A gang of college friends, including Wade (Jared Padalecki) and his girlfriend, Carly (Elisha Cuthbert), are en route to a school football game when they wind up with a flat tire in a ghost town. They are forced to seek help in the only place that's open: the local wax museum. Once inside the spooky and seemingly abandoned building, they find the works on display are not quite what they seem -- and the group soon discovers it's being hunted by the insane twin brothers who run the museum.

programme.title: Ghost Ship
programme.desc: In a remote region of the Bering Sea, a boat salvage crew discovers the eerie remains of a grand passenger liner thought lost for more than 40 years. But once onboard the eerie, cavernous ship, the crew of the Arctic Warrior discovers that the decaying vessel is anything but deserted. It's home to something more deadly and horrific than anything they've encountered in all their years at sea.

programme.title: Thirteen Ghosts
programme.desc: A state-of-the-art remake of the classic William Castle horror film about a family that inherits a spectacular old house from an eccentric uncle. There's just one problem: the house seems to have a dangerous agenda all its own. Trapped in their new home by strangely shifting walls, the family encounters powerful and vengeful entities that threaten to annihilate anyone in their path.

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers
programme.desc: After making a horrific discovery in the basement of an old abandoned church, Trish (Gina Philips) and her brother Darry (Justin Long) watch their routine road trip home from college turn into a heart-stopping race for their lives. They find themselves the chosen prey of an indestructible force that relentlessly pursues them and gives a new and chilling meaning to the old song "Jeepers Creepers.".

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: Bert (James DeBello), a college student vacationing with friends in the mountains, mistakenly shoots a local man (Arie Verveen) with a skin infection while hunting in the woods. Panicking, he abandons the scene and leaves the man for dead. When the man stumbles into a reservoir, he infects the water supply, and soon one of Bert's friends becomes infected. The friends struggle to stop the contagious, flesh-eating disease while on the run from a group of ornery backwoods locals out for revenge.

programme.title: Piranha 3D
programme.desc: Spring break turns gory when an underground tremor releases hundreds of prehistoric, carnivorous fish into Lake Victoria, a popular waterside resort. Local cop Julie Forester (Elisabeth Shue) must join forces with a band of unlikely strangers -- though they are badly outnumbered -- to destroy the ravenous creatures before everyone becomes fish food.

programme.title: DraftKings Sportsbook Report
programme.desc: DraftKings Sportsbook, a top-rated sportsbook app!

programme.title: Freedom to Leave the House! Inogen Portable Oxygen
programme.desc: Regain independence and enjoy greater mobility with the compact design and long-lasting battery of portable oxygen.

programme.title: The Aging Brain
programme.desc: Learn what's behind mental decline with age, and how to improve memory, focus and concentration with NeuroQ's Darrin Peterson and Dale Bredesen MD.

programme.title: Overwhelmed with IRS Debt? Keys to Resolving Tax Debt
programme.desc: See how one company is changing people's lives by helping them put their tax problems to rest.

programme.title: Health and Wellness Insights for Older Adults Dr. Roberts
programme.desc: At Oak Street Health, our doctors take the time to get to know you and your needs. We can help you get the most out of your Medicare coverage, set up mail-order prescriptions, and coordinate healthcare & social services. VISITOAKSTREETHEALTH.COM.

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: The residents of a rural mining town discover that an unfortunate chemical spill has caused hundreds of little spiders to mutate overnight to the size of SUVs. It's up to mining engineer Chris McCormack (David Arquette) and Sheriff Sam Parker (Kari Wuhrer) to mobilize an eclectic group of townspeople into battle against the bloodthirsty eight-legged beasts.

programme.title: Leprechaun
programme.desc: Dan O'Grady (Shay Duffin) steals 100 gold coins from a leprechaun (Warwick Davis) while on vacation in Ireland. The leprechaun follows him home, but Dan locks the murderous midget in a crate, held at bay by a four-leaf clover. Ten years later, J.D. Redding (John Sanderford) and his daughter, Tory (Jennifer Aniston), rent O'Grady's property for the summer. When their new neighbors accidentally release the leprechaun, he goes on a murderous rampage to reclaim his gold.

programme.title: Pumpkinhead
programme.desc: After his son dies in a hit-and-run accident, Ed Harley (Lance Henriksen) seeks revenge against the teenagers responsible. With the help of a local witch (Florence Schauffler), Ed summons the vengeful demon Pumpkinhead to hunt and kill the group of friends. But when Ed discovers a bond between himself and the creature, he begins to have second thoughts about employing the vicious monster, and he fights to end Pumpkinhead's murderous rampage before it is too late.

programme.title: The Thing
programme.desc: In remote Antarctica, a group of American research scientists are disturbed at their base camp by a helicopter shooting at a sled dog. When they take in the dog, it brutally attacks both human beings and canines in the camp and they discover that the beast can assume the shape of its victims. A resourceful helicopter pilot (Kurt Russell) and the camp doctor (Richard Dysart) lead the camp crew in a desperate, gory battle against the vicious creature before it picks them all off, one by one.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: Doctor Louis Creed (Dale Midkiff) moves his family to Maine, where he meets a friendly local named Jud Crandall (Fred Gwynne). After the Creeds' cat is accidentally killed, Crandall advises Louis to bury it in the ground near the old pet cemetery. The cat returns to life, its personality changed for the worse. When Louis' son, Gage (Miko Hughes), dies tragically, Louis decides to bury the boy's body in the same ground despite the warnings of Crandall and Louis' visions of a deceased patient.

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: When a mysterious creature violently kills a man in a Maine lake, Jack Wells (Bill Pullman), the local game warden, looks into the bizarre case, along with Sheriff Hank Keough (Brendan Gleeson) and visiting paleontologist Kelly Scott (Bridget Fonda). Looking for clues in a tooth that the beast left behind, Kelly and the others eventually locate the monster, a massive and vicious reptile eager to devour anything in its path. Can the crocodile-like creature be stopped?

programme.title: Tremors
programme.desc: Repairmen Val McKee (Kevin Bacon) and Earl Bassett (Fred Ward) are tired of their dull lives in the small desert town of Perfection, Nev. But just as the two try to skip town, they happen upon a series of mysterious deaths and a concerned seismologist (Finn Carter) studying unnatural readings below the ground. With the help of an eccentric couple (Reba McEntire, Michael Gross), the group fights for survival against giant, worm-like monsters hungry for human flesh.

programme.title: Child's Play
programme.desc: Gunned down by Detective Mike Norris (Chris Sarandon), dying murderer Charles Lee Ray (Brad Dourif) uses black magic to put his soul inside a doll named Chucky -- which Karen Barclay (Catherine Hicks) then buys for her young son, Andy (Alex Vincent). When Chucky kills Andy's baby sitter, the boy realizes the doll is alive and tries to warn people, but he's institutionalized. Now Karen must convince the detective of the murderous doll's intentions, before Andy becomes Chucky's next victim.

programme.title: Cujo
programme.desc: In this tale of a killer canine, man's best friend turns into his worst enemy. When sweet St. Bernard Cujo is bitten by a bat, he starts behaving oddly and becomes very aggressive. As Cujo morphs into a dangerous beast, he goes on a rampage in a small town. Stay-at-home mom Donna (Dee Wallace) gets caught in Cujo's crosshairs on a fateful errand with her son, Tad (Danny Pintauro). Stuck in their tiny car, Donna and Tad have a frightening showdown with the crazed animal.

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Filmmaker Terri Flores (Jennifer Lopez) is traveling deep in the Amazon jungle looking for a forgotten tribe. Terri and her crew, which includes an anthropologist (Eric Stoltz) and a cameraman (Ice Cube), come across Paul (Jon Voight), who is stranded on the riverbank. He offers to help them find the tribe, but his secretive behavior puts everyone on edge. They realize too late that he's using them to find a legendary anaconda that's worth a fortune -- if they can catch it.
