programme.title: An Aetna Medicare Advantage plan might be right for you
programme.desc: When it comes to Medicare coverage, there are a lot of options. Learn about your choices so that you can select the coverage that's right for you. Call to speak with a licensed Aetna agent today.

programme.title: The People Under the Stairs
programme.desc: When young Fool (Brandon Adams) breaks into the home of his family's greedy and uncaring landlords, he discovers a disturbing scenario where incestuous adult siblings have mutilated a number of boys and kept them imprisoned under stairs in their large, creepy house. As Fool attempts to flee before the psychopaths can catch him, he meets their daughter, Alice (A.J. Langer), who has been spared any extreme discipline by her deranged parents. Can Fool and Alice escape before it's too late?

programme.title: Freddy's Dead: The Final Nightmare
programme.desc: Murderous ghoul Freddy Krueger (Robert Englund) has slaughtered every last child in his hometown. He ventures on to a new location, scouting fresh young victims to hack up with his finger blades. He arrives in a small town in which his long-lost daughter, Maggie (Lisa Zane), works as a therapist for troubled youths. He attempts to recruit her for his dastardly pursuits, but she has other ideas. Father and daughter meet for a bloody showdown that will determine Freddy's fate once and for all.

programme.title: Wes Craven's New Nightmare
programme.desc: Reality and fantasy meet in unsettling ways in this installment of the long-running horror series, which finds director Wes Craven and actors Heather Langenkamp and Robert Englund all portraying themselves. As Heather (Heather Langenkamp) considers making another film with Craven, her son, Dylan (Miko Hughes), falls under the spell of the iconic disfigured villain Freddy Krueger (Robert Englund). Eventually, Langenkamp must confront Freddy's demonic spirit to save the soul of Dylan.

programme.title: Candyman
programme.desc: Skeptical graduate student Helen Lyle (Virginia Madsen) befriends Anne-Marie McCoy (Vanessa Williams) while researching superstitions in a housing project on Chicago's Near North Side. From Anne-Marie, Helen learns about the Candyman (Tony Todd), a knife-wielding figure of urban legend that some of her neighbors believe to be responsible for a recent murder. After a mysterious man matching the Candyman's description begins stalking her, Helen comes to fear that the legend may be all too real.

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Crystal Lake's history of murder doesn't deter counselors from setting up a summer camp in the woodsy area. Superstitious locals warn against it, but the fresh-faced young people -- Jack (Kevin Bacon), Alice (Adrienne King), Bill (Harry Crosby), Marcie (Jeannine Taylor) and Ned (Mark Nelson) -- pay little heed to the old-timers. Then they find themselves stalked by a brutal killer. As they're slashed, shot and stabbed, the counselors struggle to stay alive against a merciless opponent.

programme.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
programme.desc: In Wes Craven's classic slasher film, several Midwestern teenagers fall prey to Freddy Krueger (Robert Englund), a disfigured midnight mangler who preys on the teenagers in their dreams -- which, in turn, kills them in reality. After investigating the phenomenon, Nancy (Heather Langenkamp) begins to suspect that a dark secret kept by her and her friends' parents may be the key to unraveling the mystery, but can Nancy and her boyfriend Glen (Johnny Depp) solve the puzzle before it's too late?

programme.title: Freddy vs. Jason
programme.desc: Two horror icons face off in this supernatural movie. Disfigured serial killer Freddy Krueger (Robert Englund), who attacks his victims in their dreams, has lost much of his power since citizens of his town have become less afraid of him. Enlisting the help of fellow violent murderer Jason Voorhees (Ken Kirzinger), Freddy orchestrates a new killing spree. However, when the hockey-mask-wearing psychopath won't stop chopping up Freddy's intended victims, the two ghouls start to battle each other.

programme.title: Jason X
programme.desc: The year is 2455. The Place is Old Earth. Once the shimmering blue jewel of the galaxy, Old Earth is now a contaminated planet abandoned for centuries. Yet humans have returned to the deadly place that they once fled. Not to live, but to research the ancient rusting artifacts of the bygone civilizations that caused this environmental disaster. And little does the most recent landing party of intrepid young explorers realize the fate that awaits them.

programme.title: The Walking Dead: Daryl Dixon
programme.desc: Carol helps Antonio and Roberto while Daryl journeys into the desert in search of someone.

programme.title: Jet Attack
programme.desc: A U.S. Air Force jet scientist is shot down over North Korea during the Korean War. He might be dead, but a three-man rescue party, led by Capt. Tom Arnett (John Agar), is sent into enemy territory to bring him back. Once in hostile surroundings, Arnett and his men hook up with a Communist nurse, Tanya (Audrey Totter), who helps them. Disguised as doctors, Arnett and his men find the scientist. Then the hard part begins: getting back to base safely.

programme.title: Tanks of El Alamein
programme.desc: During the height of World War II, a diverse group of Italian men is sent to Northern Africa to help defend the region from the advancing British army. Unfortunately, the soldiers are unprepared for the harsh desert, and they are easily overwhelmed by British troops. The surviving men find shelter in a friendly village, where they are ordered to maintain their position. From there, all the Italian soldiers can do is wait for the siege of enemy troops and certain death.

programme.title: Interested in Gold? Learn more!
programme.desc: Gold has been the best long-term asset class for thousands of years. Find out how you can protect your financial future by diversifying your nest-egg with physical Gold today.

programme.title: Freedom to Leave the House! Inogen Portable Oxygen
programme.desc: Regain independence and enjoy greater mobility with the compact design and long-lasting battery of portable oxygen.

programme.title: LegXercise Pro - Patented - FREE Deluxe Upgrade for First 300 Callers!
programme.desc: LegXercise Pro boosts circulation, soothes pain, and reduces swelling with automatic leg movement. Its patented walking simulator keeps your legs active while you sit, improving mobility. CALL NOW for a DELUXE Upgrade for our first 300 callers!

programme.title: Paid Programming
programme.desc: Paid programming.

programme.title: The Aging Brain
programme.desc: Learn what's behind mental decline with age, and how to improve memory, focus and concentration with NeuroQ's Darrin Peterson and Dale Bredesen MD.

programme.title: An Aetna Medicare Advantage plan might be right for you
programme.desc: When it comes to Medicare coverage, there are a lot of options. Learn about your choices so that you can select the coverage that's right for you. Call to speak with a licensed Aetna agent today.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.desc: Peeping Tom's ghost wants to meet Lady Godiva.

programme.title: The Exorcist
programme.desc: One of the most profitable horror movies ever made, this tale of an exorcism is based loosely on actual events. When young Regan (Linda Blair) starts acting odd -- levitating, speaking in tongues -- her worried mother (Ellen Burstyn) seeks medical help, only to hit a dead end. A local priest (Jason Miller), however, thinks the girl may be seized by the devil. The priest makes a request to perform an exorcism, and the church sends in an expert (Max von Sydow) to help with the difficult job.

programme.title: Poltergeist
programme.desc: Strange and creepy happenings beset an average California family, the Freelings -- Steve (Craig T. Nelson), Diane (JoBeth Williams), teenaged Dana (Dominique Dunne), eight-year-old Robbie (Oliver Robins), and five-year-old Carol Ann (Heather O'Rourke) -- when ghosts commune with them through the television set. Initially friendly and playful, the spirits turn unexpectedly menacing, and, when Carol Ann goes missing, Steve and Diane turn to a parapsychologist and eventually an exorcist for help.

programme.title: Stephen King's It
programme.desc: Seven friends engage in a struggle with the demon they first encountered 30 years earlier in their Maine hometown; from the Stephen King book.

programme.title: Stephen King's It
programme.desc: Seven friends engage in a struggle with the demon they first encountered 30-years earlier in their Maine hometown. From the Stephen King book.

programme.title: Christine
programme.desc: Unpopular nerd Arnie Cunningham (Keith Gordon) buys a 1958 Plymouth Fury, which he names Christine. Arnie develops an unhealthy obsession with the car, to the alarm of his jock friend, Dennis Guilder (John Stockwell). After bully Buddy Repperton (William Ostrander) defaces Christine, the auto restores itself to perfect condition and begins killing off Buddy and his friends. Determined to stop the deaths, Dennis and Arnie's girlfriend, Leigh Cabot (Alexandra Paul), decide to destroy Christine.

programme.title: It
programme.desc: Seven young outcasts in Derry, Maine, are about to face their worst nightmare -- an ancient, shape-shifting evil that emerges from the sewer every 27 years to prey on the town's children. Banding together over the course of one horrifying summer, the friends must overcome their own personal fears to battle the murderous, bloodthirsty clown known as Pennywise.

programme.title: The Conjuring
programme.desc: In 1970, paranormal investigators and demonologists Lorraine (Vera Farmiga) and Ed (Patrick Wilson) Warren are summoned to the home of Carolyn (Lili Taylor) and Roger (Ron Livingston) Perron. The Perrons and their five daughters have recently moved into a secluded farmhouse, where a supernatural presence has made itself known. Though the manifestations are relatively benign at first, events soon escalate in horrifying fashion, especially after the Warrens discover the house's macabre history.

programme.title: Liebe auf der Straße
programme.desc: Moderatorin Abby verwandelt Kleinstadtrestaurant. Mit Tom in Küche und Herz entdeckt sie Liebe und Heimat.

programme.title: Finding Love in Mountain View
programme.desc: Margaret Garvey ist eine erfolgreiche Architektin. Sie lebt für ihren Job und ihre Kunden – sehr zum Leidwesen der Beziehung zu ihrem Freund Nathan. Doch ein Anruf bringt ihr Leben völlig durcheinander: Ihre Cousine Susan und deren Mann sind bei einem Autounfall ums Leben gekommen und Margaret soll der Vormund für die beiden Kinder werden. Früher waren die Cousinen beste Freundinnen, doch sie hatten jahrelang keinen Kontakt. Margaret macht sich auf den Weg in ihre alte Heimat Mountain View, die sie seit Ewigkeiten nicht mehr besucht hat. Dort trifft sie auf die beiden ihr völlig fremden Kinder, zu denen sie nur langsam Zugang findet. Eine große Hilfe ist ihre Jugendliebe Andrew, der als deren Lehrer die engste Vertrauensperson der Kinder ist. Trotzdem fühlt Margaret sich überfordert und muss sich nicht nur entscheiden, ob sie lieber den einfachen Weg zurück in ihr altes Leben wählt oder den letzten Willen ihrer Cousine erfüllen möchte, sondern auch für wen ihr Herz schlägt.

programme.title: Tag X
programme.desc: Die alleinerziehende und verwitwete Tanja (Carina Diesing) wird durch die Entführung ihrer Tochter Lilly (Jolie Sarah Werner) jäh aus ihrem schwierigen Alltag gerissen, nur um einem schrecklichen Familiengeheimnis auf die Spur zu kommen... - Spannender Entführungs-Thriller um Geheimnisse, die besser im Dunkeln verblieben wären. Von den Machern der erfolgreichen Mystery Mini-Serie "Ebersberg".

programme.title: Der Liebhaber
programme.desc: 5 Jahre nach dem Tod ihres Sohnes will Tess leben, doch die Besessenheit eines Soldaten stürzt sie ins Chaos.

programme.title: Meine Geburtstagsromanze
programme.desc: Callie sucht für ihren 35. Geburtstag einen falschen Freund, verliebt sich aber tatsächlich.

programme.title: Hören Sie auf die Liebe
programme.desc: Podcast-Produzentin Peyton und unkonventioneller Star Alex suchen Liebe in Show. Öffnung des Herzens führt zur eigenen Liebe.

programme.title: Liebe auf der Straße
programme.desc: Moderatorin Abby verwandelt Kleinstadtrestaurant. Mit Tom in Küche und Herz entdeckt sie Liebe und Heimat.

Von den Machern der erfolgreichen Mystery Mini-Serie "Ebersberg".

programme.title: Der Prinz & ich
programme.desc: Prinz Albert ist gezwungen, eine doppelzüngige Dame anstatt seiner amerikanischen Verlobten zu heiraten…

programme.title: Die Natur der Romantik
programme.desc: Reiseautorin Jackie trifft auf Parkwächter Sean. Funken fliegen auf Glamping-Trip. Kann es Liebe sein?

programme.title: Zuhause für ein königliches Herz
programme.desc: Erin kämpft für Shaw Bay. Theo ist ein rätselhafter Kunde. Chemie funkt, aber Geheimnisse bedrohen ihre Liebe.

programme.title: Doku: Gabun Uncharted
programme.desc: Unberührte Natur, wilde Tiere und weit weg von jeglicher Zivilisation: Die SEND-Crew begibt sich mit einer Elite-Kajak-Crew auf das ultimative Kajak-Abenteuer auf dem Ivindo-Fluss.

programme.title: Reel Rock S10 E1: Solo-Klettern auf Mallorca
programme.desc: Reel Rock: Von alpinen Legenden und jungen Helden – das australische Kletterwunderkind Angie Scarth-Johnson und Hazel Findlay bezwingen Mallorcas spektakulärste Tiefwasser-Solo-Routen.

programme.title: Reel Rock S10 E2: Kletterwettbewerb auf Mallcorca
programme.desc: Angie Scarth-Johnson erkennt, dass der Psicobloc-Kletterwettbewerb nicht nur körperliche, sondern auch mentale Stärke erfordert – kann sie über sich hinauswachsen?

programme.title: Reel Rock S10 E3: Grenzerfahrung für blinden Kletterer
programme.desc: Der blinde Abenteuersportler Erik Weihenmayer stellt sich einer gewaltigen Herausforderung und will eine der imposantesten Felswände der Sierra Nevada erklimmen – schafft er es bis nach oben?

programme.title: Reel Rock S10 E4: Erstbegehung des Mt. Mizugaki
programme.desc: Der dreifache Kletterweltmeister Sachi Amma wird zum Puristen. Mit einer kühnen Erstbegehung am Mt. Mizugaki erfüllt er sich den Traum eines Projekts, bei dem Körper, Verstand und Seele eins werden.

programme.title: Kletter-Film: Mit Angie Scarth-Johnson auf Kletter-Tour
programme.desc: Die australische Kletterin Angie Scarth-Johnson, mit 18 Jahren bereits eine Meisterin von 9a-Routen, hat noch viel vor. Ein Wunderkind der Kletterszene auf dem Weg zu neuen Höhen.

programme.title: Against Gravity
programme.desc: Surf-Doku: Olympionike und Deutschlands Top-Surfprofi Leon Glatzer nimmt uns mit auf eine aufregende Reise zu den besten Surfspots der Welt.

programme.title: BMX Film: Go Fast Pull Up
programme.desc: Die Evolution des BMX von den 80ern zu den 90ern. Go Fast Pull Up wirft einen Blick auf das Leben des BMX-Fahrers Jimmy LeVan und seine Rolle in der Geschichte des Sports.

programme.title: Born Racers S1 E1: Verzicht
programme.desc: Die Serie zum MotoGP Rookies Cup taucht tief in das Leben der Nachwuchstalente ein - ihre Familien setzen alles auf eine Karte, opfern Heimat und Sicherheit, um den Traum wahr werden zu lassen.

programme.title: Doku: Faszination Red Bull Dolomitenmann
programme.desc: Der Red Bull Dolomitenmann – der härteste Teamwettkampf der Welt. Ein Klassiker für alle, die sich quälen wollen. Diese Doku zeigt, wie alles begann und warum der Wettkampf bis heute fasziniert.

programme.title: MTB-Film: Rheeder jagt den nächsten Slopestyle-Sieg
programme.desc: Brett Rheeder zwischen Druck und Leidenschaft: Die Crankworx Series 2018 führt den Slopestyle-Star nach Rotorua, Innsbruck und Whistler – drei Stopps, ein Ziel: der nächste große Sieg.

programme.title: Reel Rock S10 E2: Kletterwettbewerb auf Mallcorca
programme.desc: Angie Scarth-Johnson erkennt, dass der Psicobloc-Kletterwettbewerb nicht nur körperliche, sondern auch mentale Stärke erfordert – kann sie über sich hinauswachsen?

programme.title: Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen Jordanien 2023: Highlights
programme.desc: Erlebe das Red Bull Seifenkistenrennen in Jordanien, wenn kreative Teams mit gewagten Designs durch die Hügel von Amman rasen.

programme.title: Live to Compete S1 E2: Carlos Sainz
programme.desc: Rallye galt in Spanien als relativ unbekannter Sport, als Carlos Sainz sein WRC-Debüt feierte - sein Erfolg änderte das aber schnell.

programme.title: Surf-Doku: Mega Ritt auf Taifun-Wellen
programme.desc: Ein herannahender Taifun bringt unberechenbare Bedingungen nach Japan. Ian Walsh, Makua Rothman, Ezekiel Lau und Danny Fuller wagen in Miyazaki den Ritt auf den riesigen Wellen.

programme.title: More than a Dive S2 E5: Fjorde von Oslo
programme.desc: Erlebe atemberaubende Cliff Diving Sprünge inmitten der beeindruckenden Fjorde von Oslo, mit dem kultigen Opernhaus als majestätischer Kulisse.

programme.title: Red Bull Cliff Diving World Series 2023: Japan
programme.desc: In den Bergen der Präfektur Miyazaki in Japan wird der Kampf um die King Kahekili-Trophäe in den fließenden Gewässern unterhalb der Takachiho-Schlucht eine neue Dimension erhalten.

programme.title: Tanz Film: (Un)credited
programme.desc: Der Afro Dance kommt aus Nigeria und wurde zur globalen Mainstream-Kultur. Diese Doku wirft einen Blick auf seine Geschichte, Gegenwart und Zukunft und würdigt seine Schöpfer.

programme.title: Doku: Gabun Uncharted
programme.desc: Unberührte Natur, wilde Tiere und weit weg von jeglicher Zivilisation: Die SEND-Crew begibt sich mit einer Elite-Kajak-Crew auf das ultimative Kajak-Abenteuer auf dem Ivindo-Fluss.

programme.title: Screenland S1 E6: Doku über Videospiel-Archivierung
programme.desc: Von kultureller Bildung bis zur Archivierung von Hardware – zwei faszinierende Geschichten über die Konservierung in der Welt der Videospiele.

programme.title: Adventure Doku: Erstbegehung des Mount Shivling
programme.desc: Vier Schweizer Alpinisten stellen sich der ultimativen Herausforderung: eine Erstbegehung des 6.543 m hohen Mount Shivling in Indien. Sie gehen an ihre Grenzen – doch erreichen alle den Gipfel?

programme.title: Explorers S1 E2: Sintflut am Sambesi
programme.desc: Der südafrikanische Kajaker und Abenteurer Steve Fisher plant das riskanteste Projekt seiner Karriere: Er kämpft sich durch die engen Schluchten des Zambezi unter den Viktoriafällen.

programme.title: Dedicate S1 E1: Weltrekordversuch im Fallschirmspringen
programme.desc: 65 Frauen wagen den Sprung: In einem spektakulären Weltrekordversuch fliegen sie kopfüber in Formation Richtung Erde. Ob ihr Traum vom Rekord gelingt? Eine Hommage an Mut, Leidenschaft und Teamgeist.

programme.title: MTB Film: Gamble
programme.desc: Die besten Downhill-Mountainbiker stürzen sich in unbekanntes Terrain. Was bleibt am Ende? Roher Speed, brachiale Action und eine unberührte Location – begleitet von einem mitreißenden Soundtrack.

programme.title: Bike Doku: Freeride-Mountainbiking neu definiert
programme.desc: Eine neue Generation von Freeride-Mountainbikerinnen sprengt Limits: Patricia Druwen, Thomas Genon und Emil Johansson erobern neues Terrain – mit Style, Mut und grenzenloser Kreativität.

programme.title: Screenland S1 E6: Doku über Videospiel-Archivierung
programme.desc: Von kultureller Bildung bis zur Archivierung von Hardware – zwei faszinierende Geschichten über die Konservierung in der Welt der Videospiele.

programme.title: Top Travel

programme.title: Summer Fun Destinations
programme.desc: More than 50 million people travel to Los Angeles each year, thanks to its year-round summer-like weather and plethora of fun things to do; this episode tours the city in a fun three-wheeled car, taste testing its best kept secrets.

programme.title: Selling Jets
programme.desc: Dallas couple Dave and Angela see a Beechjet 400A; Graham and Stephanie meet with Leonard Goldberg of Gold Aviation.

programme.title: Luxury Property Wars

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Monday Night Countdown
programme.desc: Previewing the Monday Night Football matchup airing later on ESPN. Host Scott Van Pelt is joined by Ryan Clark, Jason Kelce, Marcus Spears, Adam Schefter and Michelle Beisner-Buck as they analyze every last morsel of information pertaining to Monday night's combatants, plus discuss the latest news that developed out of Sunday's action.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football No subtitle
programme.desc: The Chiefs (2-2) try for their ninth straight victory over the Jaguars (3-1). Kansas City is 9-3 on Monday Night Football since two-time NFL MVP Patrick Mahomes took over as starting quarterback in 2018. Mahomes has accounted for nine TDs this year.

programme.title: Live: Monday Night Postgame
programme.desc: A recap of the Monday Night Football matchup with highlights, interviews and more.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter With Scott Van Pelt
programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. The hourlong, late-night show is driven by the host's self-deprecating wit and passion for sports, with featured elements, including Van Pelt's nightly "1 Big Thing" commentary and a weekly look back at the moments that drove bettors wild in "Bad Beats." The show also delivers what "SportsCenter" fans are used to -- news and highlights, guests and interviews -- but in a different, fast-paced and insightful way.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. programme.title: Live: 2025 WNBA Finals

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter With Scott Van Pelt
programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. The hourlong, late-night show is driven by the host's self-deprecating wit and passion for sports, with featured elements, including Van Pelt's nightly "1 Big Thing" commentary and a weekly look back at the moments that drove bettors wild in "Bad Beats." The show also delivers what "SportsCenter" fans are used to -- news and highlights, guests and interviews -- but in a different, fast-paced and insightful way.

programme.desc: Start the day off right with Chris Canty, Evan Cohen and Michelle Smallmon providing an energizing and informative way to take on the day. Sports, life and laughter are what it's all about.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith hosts this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: College Football Live
programme.desc: Want to know up-to-the-minute reports about your favorite college football team? ESPN has it covered with this weekday studio show, a roundtable format that emphasizes discussion and opinions on the sport's biggest stories and newsmakers. The half-hour program features a rotating roster of analysts that includes coaches, former players, and media personalities.

programme.title: ESPN BET Live
programme.desc: ESPN Sports Betting Analysts Erin Dolan and Joe Fortenbaugh, along with host Tyler Fulghum, break down the biggest storylines through the lens of sports betting, with breakdowns, discussions and picks.

programme.title: The Mina Kimes Show Featuring Lenny
programme.desc: Mina Kimes combines intense film study with sharp data analysis, plus her trademark humor and insight. She's joined each episode by a guest from around the league.

programme.title: NBA Today
programme.desc: In-depth, comprehensive daily coverage of all aspects of the NBA from expert analysts.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Golden Eagles (3-2, 1-0 Sun Belt) try to take the shine off the host Eagles (2-3, 0-1). This is the first meeting between the schools since 1941, when Southern Miss throttled Georgia Southern 70-0. The Eagles' two wins both came at home.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: When Khabib Nurmagomedov retired from MMA, the UFC's lightweight title was up for grabs. See the journey of the 155-pound belt following the Khabib Era, featuring Charles Oliveira, Dustin Poirier, Islam Makhachev, and more.

programme.title: Live: Baseball Tonight
programme.desc: If you're a fan of baseball, then you won't want to miss this show featuring highlights of all the games and updates of ones still in progress. Regularly hosted by Karl Ravech, he's joined by a rotating panel of analysts that includes former players and managers, plus reporters such as Tim Kurkjian and Buster Olney. Other hosts include Adnan Virk and Jon Sciambi.

programme.title: Good Guy/Bad Guy
programme.desc: The ex-champion of the two divisions of the UFC Daniel Cormier and former MMA fighter Chael Sonnen talk about their passion shared by MMA and the rest of the sport world.

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all – the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: Friends Fright Challenge
programme.desc: Feeling out of her comfort zone and overwhelmed by Olly's obsession with fame, Paisley turns to Zac for help with something completely unrelated: dancing.

programme.title: Snakebit
programme.desc: Lloyd, having been kicked out of the Hynobrai snake tribe unlocks a second tribe – The Fangpyres – to help him regain control. The Ninja are busy setting up their new HQ that Zane discovered, but are called to duty when the Fangpyres attack the village where Jay's family lives.

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes
programme.desc: The Avengers must now fight one of their own, and they're not sure what to do! Cap and Thor lead the charge, but can't fend off Iron Man and Ultron's Minions. Meanwhile, Black Widow, Hawkeye and Hulk track down a signal that seems to be controlling Iron Man from a castle in the “Little Sokovia” section of New York. There they fight HYDRA and BARON VON STRUCKER and learn that YELLOWJACKET is the “bug” that infected Iron Man's suit for Ultron. To help break Iron Man free from Ultron's control, the Avengers call in their own bug...ANT MAN!The Avengers prepare for a party with a surprise guest when Ultron crashes the preparations by using mind control on Iron Man. While trying to rescue their leader, the rest of the team discovers that Baron Stucker, HYDRA, and Yellowjacket are in on Ultron's plans. While preparing for a party at Avengers' Tower, THE AVENGERS (IRON MAN, CAPTAIN AMERICA, BLACK WIDOW, HAWKEYE, THOR, HULK and VISION) notice Iron Man acting strangely. When Iron Man volunteers

programme.title: The Power Of Merlok
programme.desc: When Jestro attacks a village on the far side of the Kingdom, the NEXO-Knights wonder how they'll get there. Then Macy remembers her dad has a royal RV…maybe they can “mod” that for their own, “knightly” use? Now the NEXO-Knights get rolling…in THE FORTREX, their own ROLLING CASTLE! This great new HQ, which houses Merlok 2.0 as an operating system, will be how the knights move around Knighton and protect it from Jestro and his monsters. Speaking of the evil jester, in this episode Jestro uses some newly-made monsters to attack a town far from the capitol where he thinks he's safe from the Knights' reach. We see two parallel stories here: the Knights training, learning more about digital magic and getting organized as a team and at the same time we see Jestro making monsters, trying to learn how his powers work and talking to the Book. In the end, the Knights roll up in their castle and defeat Jestro and his marauding monsters. Lance thinks he should be the leader because he's a snot. “

programme.title: The Warrior Within
programme.desc: Cragger tricks Laval into withholding CHI from the Crocodile tribe. This reignites the hostilities between the Lions and Crocodiles. Laval must frantically escape the wrath of the Crocs and somehow get rid of the CHI before his father finds out.

programme.title: The Hybrid Horror!
programme.desc: A terrified hybrid dinosaur rampages through the park, causing chaos and creating cover for Danny and Sinjin as they try to steal the Nedry videotape.

programme.title: The Snowball Effect
programme.desc: Laval and Li'Ella's relationship grows as he gives her a tour of the Lion City. But distracted, he misses a key battle against the Hunters. Tormak joins the fight and saves the day. But the Lion King Lagravis is captured and brought to the Ice Fort. Who will lead the Lions now?!?

programme.title: The Spectral Lands
programme.desc: Arin ventures into a dangerous new land to heal Ras while Nya and Kai come up with a plan to make Jay come to them.

programme.title: The Great Zane Robbery
programme.desc: Zane's search for Arin leads to an old friend but lands him in the middle of the Forbidden Five's hunt for the Prismatic Blades.

programme.title: Legendary Places, Ninjago's Most Wanted
programme.desc: Cole joins Jay and Zane inside the Nindroid to solve a mysterious puzzle and also Kai enters Zane's mind and suggests the Ninja take a break from puzzle-solving to figure out which villain is trying to hack their friend.

programme.title: Stampede!
programme.desc: While stranded in the jungle during a massive storm, Claire and Simon unknowingly stumble upon a clue to the whereabouts of the treasure sought by Sinjin.

programme.title: Sick Beats
programme.desc: Logan disrupts the dream world with his music, while Mateo and Izzie investigate their father's new girlfriend in the real world.

programme.title: Witchy Ways
programme.desc: The dream chasers, disobeying orders, sneak out of Castle Nocturnia to follow a raven to the Never Witch in hopes of retrieving their lost memories.

programme.title: Toss and Turn
programme.desc: The dream chasers face difficulties maintaining focus and motivation during their first R.E.M. trial, which involves capturing a wild dream creature in a rodeo-style competition.

programme.title: Friends Fright Challenge
programme.desc: Feeling out of her comfort zone and overwhelmed by Olly's obsession with fame, Paisley turns to Zac for help with something completely unrelated: dancing.

programme.title: Snakebit
programme.desc: Lloyd, having been kicked out of the Hynobrai snake tribe unlocks a second tribe – The Fangpyres – to help him regain control. The Ninja are busy setting up their new HQ that Zane discovered, but are called to duty when the Fangpyres attack the village where Jay's family lives.

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Avengers Reassembled
programme.desc: Finally, the Avengers confront Ultron and his Ultron Minions as they attack Avengers' Tower. Ultron's ultimate plan: use all the data/stuff they've stolen to free the newly rebuilt IRON LEGION, destroy the Avengers, and control the world. Tony dons the hastily repaired Hulk Buster Armor and it's on! It's a huge battle as the Avengers try to save their beloved HQ and defeat Ultron. Will they succeed? And, more importantly, can their party be saved after Ultron tries to take down their Tower?The Avengers prepare for a party with a surprise guest when Ultron crashes the preparations by using mind control on Iron Man. Then Macy remembers her dad has a royal RV…maybe they can “mod” that for their own, “knightly” use? Now the NEXO-Knights get rolling…in THE FORTREX, their own ROLLING CASTLE! This great new HQ, which houses Merlok 2.0 as an operating system, will be how the knights move around Knighton and protect it from Jestro and his monsters. Speaking of the evil jester, in this episode Jestro uses some newly-made monsters to attack a town far from the capitol where he thinks he's safe from the Knights' reach. We see two parallel stories here: the Knights training, learning more about digital magic and getting organized as a team and at the same time we see Jestro making monsters, trying to learn how his powers work and talking to the Book. In the end, the Knights roll up in their castle and defeat Jestro and his marauding monsters. Lance thinks he should be the leader because he's a snot. “

programme.title: The Warrior Within
programme.desc: Cragger tricks Laval into withholding CHI from the Crocodile tribe. This reignites the hostilities between the Lions and Crocodiles. Laval must frantically escape the wrath of the Crocs and somehow get rid of the CHI before his father finds out.

programme.title: The Hybrid Horror!
programme.desc: A terrified hybrid dinosaur rampages through the park, causing chaos and creating cover for Danny and Sinjin as they try to steal the Nedry videotape.

programme.title: The Snowball Effect
programme.desc: Laval and Li'Ella's relationship grows as he gives her a tour of the Lion City. But distracted, he misses a key battle against the Hunters. Tormak joins the fight and saves the day. But the Lion King Lagravis is captured and brought to the Ice Fort. Who will lead the Lions now?!?

programme.title: The Spectral Lands
programme.desc: Arin ventures into a dangerous new land to heal Ras while Nya and Kai come up with a plan to make Jay come to them.

programme.title: The Great Zane Robbery
programme.desc: Zane's search for Arin leads to an old friend but lands him in the middle of the Forbidden Five's hunt for the Prismatic Blades.

programme.title: Legendary Places, Ninjago's Most Wanted
programme.desc: Cole joins Jay and Zane inside the Nindroid to solve a mysterious puzzle and also Kai enters Zane's mind and suggests the Ninja take a break from puzzle-solving to figure out which villain is trying to hack their friend.

programme.title: Witchy Ways
programme.desc: The dream chasers, disobeying orders, sneak out of Castle Nocturnia to follow a raven to the Never Witch in hopes of retrieving their lost memories.

programme.title: Toss and Turn
programme.desc: The dream chasers face difficulties maintaining focus and motivation during their first R.E.M. trial, which involves capturing a wild dream creature in a rodeo-style competition.

programme.title: Friends Fright Challenge
programme.desc: Feeling out of her comfort zone and overwhelmed by Olly's obsession with fame, Paisley turns to Zac for help with something completely unrelated: dancing.

programme.title: Snakebit
programme.desc: Lloyd, having been kicked out of the Hynobrai snake tribe unlocks a second tribe – The Fangpyres – to help him regain control. The Ninja are busy setting up their new HQ that Zane discovered, but are called to duty when the Fangpyres attack the village where Jay's family lives.

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Avengers Reassembled
programme.desc: The Avengers prepare for a party with a surprise guest when Ultron crashes the preparations by using mind control on Iron Man. While trying to rescue their leader, the rest of the team discovers that Baron Stucker, HYDRA, and Yellowjacket are in on Ultron's plans. While preparing for a party at Avengers' Tower, THE AVENGERS (IRON MAN, CAPTAIN AMERICA, BLACK WIDOW, HAWKEYE, THOR, HULK and VISION) notice Iron Man acting strangely. When Iron Man volunteers to go out and get more ice, they find it odd: when has Tony every volunteered to get anything? Suddenly, ULTRON appears on a screen: he's taken control of Iron Man! To make matters worse, Ultron takes over all the versions of Iron Man's armor and they fly off!Finally, the Avengers confront Ultron and his Ultron Minions as they attack Avengers' Tower. Ultron's ultimate plan: use all the data/stuff they've stolen to free the newly rebuilt IRON LEGION, destroy the Avengers, and control the world. Tony dons the hastily repaired Hulk Buster

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After a disastrous failed mission, Sonic laments that they can't go back and prevent Robotnik's take-over. Dulcy tells them they can and takes Sonic and Sally to the Floating Island where they find the "Time Stones".

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: While on a mission to the big city to replace Nicole's malfunctioning microchip, Sonic and Sally encounter the Guardian, a mysterious cloaked figure who guards a dormant wizard named Lazar and his computer of evil spells.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Uncle Chuck's "bug" reveals Robotnik's search for the legendary Deep Power Stones, he informs Sally, who tries to retrieve data regarding the Royal Family Secret. But she's denied access via a time-encoded lock-out.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Sonic and The Freedom Fighters take out Robotnik's main computer, they're trapped by Swat-Bots in an underground tunnel, only to be rescued by a handsome teenager named Griff. Griff takes them deep beneath the Big City.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic and The Freedom Fighters journey to Robotnik's underground air base in a mission to reprogram the launch data on Robotnik's fleet of Stealth-Bot aircraft. While attempting to reprogram the Stealth-Bot computer system.

programme.desc: The Price of Freedom Sonia discovers that the watch she received from her friend is actually a monitoring device for the Robotnik Intelligence Agency.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Bug A group of Freedom Fighters is obliterated by a swarm of metallic fly-bots. When Manic goes looking for the insects, he is stung with serum.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The Jewel of the Crown Robotnik has his eyes set upon Queen Aleena's crown jewel, but Sonic, Manic and Sonia plan to retrieve the gem before Robotnik.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sonic Tonic A speed enhancing fluid deemed Sonic Tonic is created by Robotnik to make him as fast as Sonic so that he may finally catch him.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: When in Rome... Sonic becomes aggravated that maybe their efforts of fighting for freedom seem pointless. Sonia suggests that they go to the Oracle for advice.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Artifact The Hedgehogs steal historical artifacts of Mobuis from Robotnik before he can pawn them off at an auction.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Over The Hill Hero An elderly, out of shape, overweight superhero keeps trying to help Sonic battle Dr. Robotnik, and keeps getting him in more jepordy. Sonic helps the old hero regain his self respect and they team up to battle Robotnik's latest scheme.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robolympics When Robotnik puts a meteor on a collision course with a village, Sonic is forced to compete in the Robolympics to save the village. After a series of wild, booby trapped events, Sonic is victorious.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: The Robots' Robot Scratch and Grounder build their own robot, a naive over-grown kid called "Robot". When Robot runs off with Robotnik's new invention, the Super Planetary Implosion Module (SPIM), capable of impoding huge parts of Mobius out of existence, the race...

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: The Robotnik Express Big Griz, leader of a group of biker-bear rebels, mistakes Scratch and Grounder for Sonic and Tails, and teams up with S and G to attack the real Sonic and Tails.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Babysitter Jitters When Sonic rescues a village from a flash flood, he's left with the job of babysitting three baby Groundhogs.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Tails in Charge Sonic leaves Tails in charge of protecting a squirrel village food supply, when he zips off to stop a dam from breaking. Robotnik sends Scratch and Grounder after Tails.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik invents a Brain Evolution Achievement Negatizer, or B.E.A.N., in order to make all of Mobius stupid. But instead of turning Sonic and Tails into dummies, the BEAN device turns them into three year old babies!

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik decides to cripple Mobius' three major transit systems: Rail, Air, and Sea in order to fully gain control of the planet. Sonic has to circumnavigate the planet in order to save the day.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When Tails gets trapped in the "Warp of Confusion" (an Escher-like world of another dimension) by Robotnik's cousin, Dr. Warpnik, Sonic comes to the rescue and traps Robotnik and his badniks in the warp.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik goes back to medieval times, and enlists the help of Merlink the Magician to get his gemstone.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When Sonic decides to find Tails a suitable foster home, Robotnik finds out, and creates a robot fox family which poses as Tails' long lost parents. Sonic leaves Tails with the fox family, but finally realizes they're robots and rescues Tails.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik timetravels back to Mobigypt, makes himself a pharoah, and enslaves everbody in an effort to find the gemstone of immortality.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Mobius is suffering a crime spree and all the evidence points to Sonic as the culprit. But the real thief is a lab rat wearing a high-tech vehicle suit who was sent by Robotnik to discredit our hero.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik invents a Brain Evolution Achievement Negatizer, or B.E.A.N., in order to make all of Mobius stupid. But instead of turning Sonic and Tails into dummies, the BEAN device turns them into three year old babies!

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Robotnik's momma escapes from the home for mothers of villains and demands her birthday present! When she endangers Sonic and Tails, and they manage to have her taken back to the home, even Robotnik is glad to see her go.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic plays Cyrano to bring Robotnik Jr. and Breezie together. The problem is, Breezie's crazy about Sonic. So Sonic gets out of the way, but when he does, Junior is captured by Robotnik, and Breezie comes to the rescue, finally falling for him.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When S and G rocket to outerspace to mine a radioactive mineral from asteroids, Sonic and Tails stow away. Through a blunder by the robots, all are stranded in space, and Robotnik tries to blow all of them out of the stars.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Robotnik severely upsets the ecosystem above and below the surface, when he sends explosive, Robotnik snake probes drilling deep under ground in search of oil lakes.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: While on a mission to the big city to replace Nicole's malfunctioning microchip, Sonic and Sally encounter the Guardian, a mysterious cloaked figure who guards a dormant wizard named Lazar and his computer of evil spells.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: When Uncle Chuck's "bug" reveals Robotnik's search for the legendary Deep Power Stones, he informs Sally, who tries to retrieve data regarding the Royal Family Secret. But she's denied access via a time-encoded lock-out.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sally, Rotor, Bunnie and Antoine take off in a homemade airplane, bound for an ancient city hidden deep in the Great Mountains, while Sonic follows via his favorite transportation, his sneakers.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic reluctantly takes Tails with him to the Big City to find some cotter pins for the Freedom Fighters catapults. While in the City, Sonic is nearly eaten alive by his old dog Muttski, now a roboti-sized guard dog in the Junk Heaps

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Sonic conquers Robotnik's latest evil - a vehicle designated to locate and destroy living tissue matter - during a solo mission to the Badlands. Upon Sonic's return, the Freedom Fighters honor him with a victory party.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: Antoine decides to study martial arts but after he wrecks most of Knothole Sonic sends him off to practice in the woods. //Tails begins his training to become a real Freedom Fighter by learning tracking skills while on a camping trip.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik has his eyes set upon Queen Aleena's crown jewel, but Sonic, Manic and Sonia plan to retrieve the gem before Robotnik.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: A speed enhancing fluid deemed Sonic Tonic is created by Robotnik to make him as fast as Sonic so that he may finally catch him.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: A captain of the Queen's guard is captured before he can reach the secret rendezvous where he was to meet Queen Aleena.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sonic, Manic and Sonia find an abandoned baby in an alley and begin to look for the baby's parents. Manic becomes very fond of the child.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: On a trip to Port Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia are told that ships are sinking due to the Mobian sea-beast.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The Hedgehogs find out that Sonia has inherited a castle. She basks in the idea of having a castle for headquarters.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Robotnik announces that he will marry Queen Aleena in a plot to become the king of Mobius.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sleet and Dingo plan to collect the taxes owed to Robotnik from the Duke of Velcronia but keep it for themselves.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic outsmarts Coconuts, then stumbles into a Convention of Bounty Hunter Robots where Robotnik puts a price on his head. After Sonic defeats all the Robot Bounty Hunters, Robotnik creates Scratch and Grounder to be his S.S.S.S.S. Squad.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic and Tails find an underground world of diamonds, but they are held captive there by a miserly Mole-Troll. When Robotnik comes to capture them, he accidently frees them from the Mole-Troll, who teams up with Sonic and Tails to defend his riches.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Sonic saves a damsel in distress, and falls in love with her, not knowing she's a robot built by Robotnik. But when she has a chance to trap him, she helps him escape, realizing she has fallen for him.

programme.title: Twinkle All The Way
programme.desc: (2019) Festive romance with Sarah Drew. Two single parents find themselves growing closer as they juggle a wedding and a VIP Christmas Eve party, discovering love in unexpected places.

programme.title: Christmas by The Book
programme.desc: A bestselling writer is dispatched by a TV talk show to a rural town where she is given two weeks to re-create the magical childhood Christmas described in her book. Starring Lindy Booth (2022)

programme.title: Christmas in the Air
programme.desc: Robert, a widower and father of two children, enlists Lydia to help him juggle his chaotic work-life balance at Christmastime. Will their close relationship lead to love? Stars Catherine Bell. (2017)

programme.title: A Very Country Christmas
programme.desc: (2017) Festive romance with Greyston Holt. A singer escapes the chaos of Hollywood to rediscover his love for country music. But what he stumbles upon is even better.

programme.title: A Christmas To Cherish
programme.desc: (2019) Heartwarming holiday drama with Peter Porte. A couple preparing to celebrate the perfect Christmas together must swap the fireside eggnog for a fight to save the beloved local community centre.

programme.title: Christmas Tail
programme.desc: (2014) Tail-wagging romance with Chandra West. After a single mum's puppy gets lost and is adopted by a single dad, they argue over who gets to keep him. Will they realise love is a four-legged word?

programme.title: Deck The Heart
programme.desc: (2021) Festive romance with Ashley Brinkman. A man inherits a manor and is immediately snowed under with Christmas expectations - until a charming event planner helps him unwrap the holiday spirit.

programme.title: Christmas In Paris
programme.desc: (2019) Intercontinental romance with Rebecca Dalton. There's love in the air when a French entrepreneur falls for an American businesswoman, but will she agree to fly to Paris with him for Christmas?

programme.title: Christmas on Mistletoe Lake
programme.desc: (2022) Winter romance with Genelle Williams. A woman finds herself stranded in a quaint town with no place to stay, until she meets a dashing single father with room on his boat - and in his heart.

programme.title: All I Want For Christmas
programme.desc: (2013) Festive romance with Melissa Sagemiller. All Elizabeth wants for Christmas is a promotion. Can a magical gift from Santa's helper lend a hand, not just in work, but in love and life too?

programme.title: A Christmas Coincidence
programme.desc: Paula decides to stay with her aunt for Christmas after accepting her boyfriend's wedding proposal. Will her doubts about the engagement deepen when she meets a charming inn owner? (2018)

programme.title: The Christmas Pageant
programme.desc: (2011) Festive romance starring Melissa Gilbert. A temperamental director is forced to direct a Christmas pageant. She finds herself swept up by the magic of Christmas, and an ex-lover.

programme.title: Christmas Getaway
programme.desc: (2017) Holiday romance with Bridget Regan. A jet-setting travel writer decides to take some time off for Christmas, only to discover her cabin was double-booked by a single father and his daughter.

programme.title: The Christmas Ball
programme.desc: A woman visits her Aunt in England for the holidays where she meets a handsome historian who is determined to promote her Aunt manor as a historical landmark. Starring Deirdre Mullins (2020)

programme.title: Finding Father Christmas
programme.desc: (2016) Family drama with Erin Krakow and Niall Matter. Miranda never knew who her father was, but when she finds a clue about his identity, will this Christmas deliver what she's always longed for?

programme.title: Blackmail
programme.desc: Alice White, the sweetheart of London detective Frank Webber, murders in self-defense an artist who brutally attempts to seduce her in his studio.

programme.title: Night of the Eagle
programme.desc: Witchcraft and superstition are the principal forces behind this terrifying tale of a college lecturer who, due to recent rumors of promotion above senior colleagues, is hated by the rest of the staff hated so much in fact, that someone is preparing curses inducing the lecturer's wife to commit murder...

programme.title: House in Nightmare Park
programme.desc: Foster Twelve trees, who gives hammy readings from the classics, cannot believe his luck when Stewart Henderson and his sister offer him a fee to give a reading at their eerie stately mansion.

programme.title: Death Line
programme.desc: Prominent people have been disappearing from tube stations and an MI5 agent is brought in to help solve the mysterious goings-on. What is the terrible secret of the underground system? Who or what is turning the London Underground into a Death Line?

programme.title: Circus of Horrors
programme.desc: Dr. Rossiter, a plastic surgeon wanted by the police, flees to France and under an assumed name acquires, by murder, a run-down circus.

programme.title: The Uncanny
programme.desc: Peter Cushing stars as Wilbur Gray, an eccentric author.

programme.title: Act of Murder
programme.desc: An actor attempts to win back his former mistress by putting stress on her husband - poisoning the family dog, farm animals at their country place, simulating a robbery attempt

programme.title: The Arsenal Stadium Mystery
programme.desc: Classic crime drama. During a charity match between Arsenal and the Trojans, the Trojans' striker mysteriously collapses in full view of the capacity crowd. When it is discovered that he has been poisoned, Scotland Yard is called in to investigate.

programme.title: Checkpoint
programme.desc: A gunshot rings out in an Italian motor factory, the watchman lies dead and the safe door is open. As the police arrive, a figure disappears into the shadows and fires at a mercury cylinder. Who is responsible and what do they want?

programme.title: Don't Ever Leave Me
programme.desc: Jack Denton's grandfather Harry comes out of prison. He is soon up to his old tricks: embarrassment and chaos follow.

programme.title: Frightened City
programme.desc: The 'protection racket' is rampant in London. The basic procedure for the crooks is to threaten shop-keepers and café proprietors with the destruction of their premises unless they pay a regular weekly sum of money for 'protection'.

programme.title: The Hornet's Nest
programme.desc: Story of how two young models take over a barge moored off Chelsea in which crooks have hidden the proceeds of a large-scale jewel robbery.

programme.title: Fear in the Night
programme.desc: It took Penny Heller a long time to recover from the trauma of a brutal physical assault, suffered in her youth. When she married Robert, he provided her with the love and reassurance she craved for and the two settled down in a pretty house in the grounds of the public school where Robert was a master.

programme.title: House of Secrets
programme.desc: A plot to flood Britain with counterfeit notes is discovered by the CIA in Paris. A suspect who resembles the gang leader, Chancellor, is arrested and is persuaded to take on his identity in order to infiltrate the gang and foil their plan.

programme.title: Hunted
programme.desc: When six-year-old Robbie runs away he stumbles upon a man, Chris, with a dead body. Scared that Robbie will report him, he takes him. They become close as they spend time together and when Robbie becomes ill, Chris has to make a difficult decision.

programme.title: One Jump Ahead
programme.desc: Jimmy, a young schoolboy, witnesses a murder. When the body of Richard Snell is discovered a news reporter begins investigating. He discovers that Jimmy was wearing Richard¬¨¬®‚àö‚â†s hat and that the killer murdered Richard believing he witnessed the crime.
