programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydia's life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuice's name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: An ambitious law graduate decides to leave her job as she feels her skills are not appreciated by her boss, who basically treats her like his PA. However, he won't let her go that easily.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss and can't remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that he's in it for love.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Housesitter

Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: Parenthood

His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

The two are convinced they can earn the money by getting their old band back together. However, after playing several gigs and making a few enemies, including the police, the brothers face daunting odds to deliver the money on time.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Lighthearted adventures of a pair of news vendors in New York - one deaf, one blind - who go on the run when they are blamed for the murder of a customer. Each has seen - or heard - just a whiff of a clue, and a frantic chase ensues as the duo struggle to clear their names.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountant's trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: A teenage girl wants revenge on the man who killed her father, but she needs help from legendary one-eyed marshal `Rooster' Cogburn, and a Texas Ranger.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keeper's son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the cast's heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In 1960s London, an aimless, amoral young man exploits the women with whom he becomes intimately involved, until something happens to make him reconsider his existence.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. He's blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university. Yo help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over Thanksgiving. Frank's niece says this will be easy money, but she didn't foresee Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: The Fisher King
programme.desc: When a DJ's sardonic exhortation to a late-night caller to wipe out a bar full of yuppies is taken literally, his world falls apart. Years later, on the point of suicide, he is saved by a similar casualty, a former medievalist whose wife was a victim of the bar bloodbath, and offered a chance for redemption by the man's quest for the Holy Grail.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two wisecracking Miami cops are forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million worth of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but he's shocked when his father stipulates he won't unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: The Cinema List: British Sky Originals
programme.desc: With a little something for everyone, discover a selection of British Sky Originals that includes 'Four Kids' and 'It' to 'SAS Red Notice'.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The violent story of a Mafia family fighting to establish supremacy in the American business world following World War II, where an assassination attempt leaves Vito Corleone too ill to run the family business.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleone's 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part III
programme.desc: Ex-don, Michael Corleone, tries to legitimise his family's interests while at the same time keeping his daughter out of the family's seamier dealings. His descent accelerates as the Vatican becomes involved and events from the past conspire to keep him involved in a world he is trying to forget.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two wisecracking Miami cops are forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million worth of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: Grease
programme.desc: High-spirited musical set in 1950s America, in which a girl and boy who met on the beach are unexpectedly reunited at high school. She cannot understand how different he has become. Can the leather-clad, tough-talking leader of the T-Birds really be the same person? Perhaps her new friends, the Pink Ladies, can help her win back his heart?

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: Based on the true story of an American who endured the horrors of a Turkish prison after his arrest on drug charges.

programme.title: Enter the Dragon
programme.desc: A kung fu expert is assigned to penetrate an island fortress to destroy an opium and white slavery empire.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Scientist Karen Ross is sent by her father-in-law, mogul RB Travis, to the Congo to determine the whereabouts of his son's missing diamond-hunting team. Led by expert guide Kelly, Ross and a mismatched search party including scientist Dr Peter Elliot, treasure hunter Herkermer Homolka and a gorilla, discover a danger far more sinister than anything they expected to find, even in the heart of the jungle.

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Lighthearted adventures of a pair of news vendors in New York - one deaf, one blind - who go on the run when they are blamed for the murder of a customer. Each has seen - or heard - just a whiff of a clue, and a frantic chase ensues as the duo struggle to clear their names.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A social worker who specialises in missing children is recruited to rescue a mystical Tibetan child from evil forces.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley is a Liverpudlian housewife stuck in a loveless marriage. One day she finds herself talking to the wall, and decides to make some changes in her life. Flying off to the Greek island of Mykonos on her own, she is gently romanced by middle-aged waiter Costas.

programme.title: Grease

The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friend's killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

This is the first meeting between the sides since a 3-0 win for England in the 2022 FIFA World Cup in Qatar, and they will be full of confidence after producing their finest performance of the Thomas Tuchel era last time out with an emphatic 5-0 World Cup qualifying win over Serbia. Wales kept their own qualification hopes alive with a vital 1-0 win in Kazakhstan, as head coach Craig Bellamy continues to make a strong impression since taking the role in 2024. With analysis from Roy Keane, Ian Wright and Chris Coleman, and commentary by Sam Matterface and Lee Dixon.

programme.title: Batman Begins
programme.desc: Billionaire Bruce Wayne travels the world seeking the means to fight injustice, consumed with rage over his parents' murder. Trained by a secret society, he hones his fighting skills and returns to his home city of Gotham on a mission to rid it of crime and corruption in the guise of a masked vigilante. Comic-book adventure, exploring the origins of the Dark Knight, with Christian Bale, Michael Caine, Liam Neeson, Cillian Murphy, Gary Oldman and Katie Holmes.

programme.title: Genius Game
programme.desc: With £32,000 in the prize pot the players face their sixth Main Match, Diamond Dilemma, a game in which the contestants are randomly split into two teams and need to work together to win as a team but they need to put themselves first to stay safe as an individual.

programme.title: Stronger Than You Think
programme.desc: The brand new podcast Stronger Than You Think celebrating people who have faced adversity and challenges on the road to a very successful sporting career! programme.title: Stronger Than You Think
programme.desc: A special episode of the brand new podcast Stronger Than You Think celebrating people who have faced adversity and challenges on the road to a very successful sporting career. programme.title: Stronger Than You Think
programme.desc: A brand new episode of Stronger Than You Think with another inspirational guest. Ashleigh Wilmot and Jodie Ounsley sit down with Arsenal and Scotland footballer Jen Beattie. Prepare for an emotional and uplifting discussion about Jen's journey with breast cancer.

programme.title: Inside Pass
programme.desc: Versatile Playmaker Stephen Perofeta gives his take on a 2017 match where his side, Taranaki, were challening for the Ranfurly Shield against Canterbury. programme.title: Inside Pass
programme.desc: 2013 World Player of the Year and double World Cup winner, Kieran Reed reveals his greatest rugby moments in what was unquestionably an epic career as an All Black Captain. programme.title: Inside Pass

programme.desc: We chart the remarkable journey of one of the Premier League's most iconic midfielders, Yaya Touré, from his humble beginnings in Bouaké, Ivory Coast, to his rise through European football's elite clubs. programme.title: Deutschland Outdoor
programme.desc: Felix und Max wollen dieses Mal auf das Dach Deutschlands. Ohne Vorbereitung wollen Sie den Gipfel der Zugspitze in fast 3.000 Metern Höhe erklimmen. Den Aufstieg wollen die Abenteurer in zwei Tagen schaffen, doch im hochalpinen Gelände geht ihnen langsam die Puste aus. Zudem macht Max seine Höhenangst mit jedem Meter mehr zu schaffen.

programme.title: Deutschland Outdoor
programme.desc: Wing Foil Surfen ist der neue Hype im Wassersport. Auf Norderney wollen Felix und Max diesen Trend im Selbstversuch ausprobieren. Die Österreicherin Evi und der Schotte John wollen heute eine Nacht in luftiger Höhe verbringen. Christian und seine Freundin Jana wollen heute mit Hilfe des Mikroabenteuer-Experten Christo Foerster von der Nordsee bis zur Ostsee laufen.

programme.title: Deutschland Outdoor
programme.desc: In "Bayrisch Kanada" wollen die Naturjunkies John und Evi heute mit einem Stand Up Paddle aufs Wildwasser. Die Berliner Köche Christian und Felix machen eine Fahrradtour auf dem Wasser. Und eine idyllische Ballonfahrt endet heute für Felix und Max im freien Fall. GoKart-Fahren kann jeder - Felix und Max wollen heute eine fahrende Bierkiste bauen.

programme.title: Deutschland Outdoor
programme.desc: Die Stuttgarter Felix und Max starten ihr Mikroabenteuer diesmal direkt vor der Haustür. Mit einem Longboard wollen sie mitten auf der Schwäbischen Alb 35 Kilometer zurücklegen. Der Berliner Christian will heute mit seinem Sohn und Freundin Jana ein Floss bauen und das soll die drei am Ende auch noch trocken übers Wasser bringen. Eine idyllische Ballonfahrt endet heute für John im freien Fall.

programme.title: Deutschland Outdoor

programme.desc: Jeremy (Vince Vaughn) and John (Owen Wilson) are divorce mediators who spend their free time crashing wedding receptions. For the irrepressible duo, there are few better ways to drink for free and bed vulnerable women. programme.title: Tommy Boy
programme.desc: After his beloved father (Brian Dennehy) dies, dimwitted Tommy Callahan (Chris Farley) inherits a near-bankrupt automobile parts factory in Sandusky, Ohio. His brand new stepmother, Beverly (Bo Derek), wants to cash out and close, but Tommy's sentimental attachment to his father's employees spurs him to make one last-ditch effort to find someone who will buy their products. With his father's tightly wound assistant, Richard (David Spade), in tow, Tommy hits the road to scare up some new clients.

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: The Double Deuce is the meanest, loudest and rowdiest bar south of the Mason-Dixon Line, and Dalton (Patrick Swayze) has been hired to clean it up. He might not look like much, but the Ph.D.-educated bouncer proves he's more than capable -- busting the heads of troublemakers and turning the roadhouse into a jumping hot-spot. But Dalton's romance with the gorgeous Dr. Clay (Kelly Lynch) puts him on the bad side of cutthroat local big shot Brad Wesley (Ben Gazzara).

programme.title: The Departed
programme.desc: South Boston cop Billy Costigan (Leonardo DiCaprio) goes under cover to infiltrate the organization of gangland chief Frank Costello (Jack Nicholson). As Billy gains the mobster's trust, a career criminal named Colin Sullivan (Matt Damon) infiltrates the police department and reports on its activities to his syndicate bosses. When both organizations learn they have a mole in their midst, Billy and Colin must figure out each other's identities to save their own lives.

programme.title: Sommersby
programme.desc: A man presumed dead shows up after six years, but he may be an imposter, and could choose to hang for murder rather than reveal the truth.

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A teenager wanders into Carmel, California, where he is soon introduced to the art-forgery community.

programme.title: Falling
programme.desc: John lives with his partner, Eric, and their daughter, Mónica in California, far from the traditional rural life he left behind years ago.

programme.title: Jobs
programme.desc: Ashton Kutcher is Steve Jobs, the iconic Apple innovator and groundbreaking entrepreneur. This inspiring and entertaining film chronicles Jobs early days as a college dropout, to his rise as the co-founder of Apple Computer Inc.

programme.title: Little Accidents
programme.desc: Both dramatic and suspenseful, Little Accidents shows the different ways in which people respond to tragedy.

programme.title: A Single Man
programme.desc: Previously featured at the London Film Festival. A SINGLE MAN, tells the story of a British professor who dwells on the past and cannot see his future. We follow him through a single day, where a series of events leads him to decide if there is meaning to life after the death of his partner,Jim.

programme.title: The Secret Scripture
programme.desc: Lady Rose (Vanessa Redgrave) is an elderly woman who has lived in a hospital for over 50 years. Despite her bleak surroundings there is a light in her eyes that cannot be extinguished. Dr. Stephen Grene (Eric Bana) is drawn to her, compelled to discover her past and help gain her freedom.

programme.title: Hitler: The Last Ten Days
programme.desc: Berlin, 1945. In the Fuhrerbunker, the last hiding place of the man who unleashed a reign of terror across Europe, it is Adolf Hitler's 56th birthday.

programme.title: Dreamin' Wild
programme.desc: What if a childhood dream suddenly came true - but thirty years later? That's what happened to singer/songwriter Donnie Emerson. His dream of success suddenly - and unexpectedly - came true but only as he approached 50 years old.

programme.title: Love and Honor
programme.desc: While fighting in Vietnam, Dalton hears his girlfriend back home has dumped him. He has a week's leave coming up so decides to fly to get her back. AWOL from the war zone, he has seven days to get back to the US, change his girlfriend's mind and make it back to Vietnam without anyone noticing.

programme.title: Magic Beyond Words
programme.desc: An inspiring look at JK Rowling's rise to become one of the most influential writers-from her humble beginnings, as an imaginative young girl and awkward teenager, to the loss of her mother and the genesis of the Harry Potter phenomenon.

programme.title: Emperor
programme.desc: EMPEROR is a gripping tale of love and honour forged between fierce enemies of war, a story inspired by true events, of the bold and secret moves that won peace in the shadows of postwar Japan.

programme.title: Nothing Like the Holidays
programme.desc: The far-flung members of the Rodriguez family converge at their parents' home to face what may be their last Christmas together in this heart-warming holiday comedy.

programme.title: Life of a King
programme.desc: Ex-felon, Eugene Brown, establishes a Chess Club for inner city teenagers in Washington, D.C.

programme.title: The People We Hate at the Wedding
programme.desc: Dysfunctional American siblings Alice and Paul -- along with their ever-optimistic mom-- are invited to the British wedding of their estranged half-sister, Eloise, as a chance for them to reconnect as – more or less – adults, and learn to love each other like they once did.

programme.title: Maximum Truth
programme.desc: Comedy following political grifter Rick Klingman as he aims to take down a rival congressional candidate.

programme.title: Righteous Kill
programme.desc: The story begins with highly decorated Detectives Turk and Rooster of the NYPD facing a retirement which neither of them are ready for. Before they can hang up their badges, they are called to investigate the murder of a notorious pimp, who appears to have ties to a case they solved years before.

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: Playing For Keeps is a romantic comedy about a former soccer star who returns home to put his life back together. Looking for a way to rebuild his relationship with his son, he gets roped into coaching the boy's soccer team.

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back In Business
programme.desc: The buzz is back in Barbershop 2. Calvin is struggling to keep his father's shop alive, this time against urban developers looking to replace "mom & pop" establishments with name-brand chains. The world changes, but some things never go out of style...

programme.title: Prime
programme.desc: A career driven professional from Manhattan is wooed by a young painter, who also happens to be the son of her psychoanalyst.

programme.title: Salt and fire
programme.desc: A scientist blames the head of a large company for an ecological disaster in South America. But when a volcano begins to show signs of erupting, they must unite to avoid a disaster.

programme.title: The Spy Next Door
programme.desc: Former CIA spy takes on his toughest assignment to date: looking after his girlfriend's three kids.

programme.title: Hudson
programme.desc: After his mother's death, Hudson, a reclusive but charming man, embarks on a journey with his distant cousin to scatter his mother's ashes in the Hudson Valley region of New York.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: The epic adventures of a man who discovers that he possesses the exhilarating ability to instantly teleport anywhere in the world he can imagine.

programme.title: The Internship
programme.desc: Billy (Vince Vaughn) and Nick (Owen Wilson) are salesmen whose careers have been torpedoed by the digital world. Trying to prove they are not obsolete, they defy the odds by talking their way into a coveted internship at Google, along with a battalion of brilliant college students.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: When the body of arrogant local beauty Melissa Townsend is discovered by the pool at her manor house, DCI Barnaby uncovers a seedy world of adultery and deceit within the affluent rural community.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Ring Out Your Dead DCI Barnaby investigates the murders of bell ringers from the village church who are being mysteriously murdered one by one. Barnaby and Troy find that they must solve a riddle from the past before the killer strikes again.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Murder on St Malley's Day DCI Barnaby uncovers an elite Mafia-like sect called the Pudding Club at private boys' school Devington College while investigating a murder, and must get to the bottom of the mystery before another victim turns up dead.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Market for Murder When the leader of a reading club used as a cover to run an investment portfolio is found battered to death, the club's secret activities are exposed and long-held secrets and desires return to haunt its members.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: A Worm in the Bud When Susan Bartlett's body is discovered in a wood, villagers assume she killed herself because she could not have children. However, when it comes to light that her suicide note - in the form of an email - was sent too late, Barnaby soon finds himself in the midst of witchcraft, ancient potions, infidelity and land feuds.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The Barnabys plan to renew their wedding vows for their 25th anniversary when Tom is distracted by a murder of a dying man committed with an Indian sword in Badger's Drift.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: The naked body of a young woman is found strangled in a local woodland nine years after three identical murders took place there. As DCI Barnaby and DS Troy investigate the killings, they are led further and further into the murky, clandestine world of Midsomer Worthy.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders

programme.title: Shortland Street
programme.desc: Madonna gets a surprising offer. Dawn struggles to live two lives. Maeve and Nicole find common ground.

programme.desc: Nicole questions her own mind. Monique's confronted by the cause. Viliami finds a way forward.

programme.title: Shortland Street
programme.desc: Nicole must make a choice. Rahu considers his future. Dawn gives honesty a go.

programme.title: Go Girls
programme.desc: Amy, Britta and Cody make a vow that in one year they'll each fulfil their ambition.

programme.title: Go Girls
programme.desc: Amy gets a foot in the business door but Kevin smells a rat...

programme.title: Go Girls
programme.desc: Everyone pitches in to solve Cody's man problems and Britta gets a lucky break.

programme.title: Go Girls
programme.desc: Britta's good nature gets the better of her Amy's loyalty is put to the test.

programme.title: Wild At Heart
programme.desc: Evan and Olivia run away after a series of rows with Danny, leaving Sarah to search for her children.

programme.title: Wild At Heart
programme.desc: The first tourists arrive but a power cut and rampaging elephants threaten to destroy everything...

programme.title: Wild At Heart
programme.desc: Rosie is excitedly looking forward to the arrival of her friend Izzy.

programme.title: Above Suspicion
programme.desc: Rookie DC Anna Travis takes her first case, seven women brutally and ritualistically murdered.

programme.title: Above Suspicion
programme.desc: Travis agrees to accompany Alan Daniels on a date, but is left more convinced by his innocence than his guilt.

programme.title: Above Suspicion
programme.desc: The mutilated body of a young woman seems to echo that of the unsolved Los Angeles 'Black Dahlia' murder.

programme.title: Burning Lies
programme.desc: (2021) Tense psychological thriller with Annika Foster. A woman falls for a handsome firefighter who saves her life, but soon discovers that his overprotective nature can get obsessive - and deadly.

programme.title: Secrets of a Gold Digger Killer
programme.desc: (2021) Gripping thriller based on true events, starring Julie Benz. A femme fatale with a taste for riches pulls the strings on a deadly plot to have her multi-millionaire husband murdered.

programme.title: American Heist
programme.desc: (2014) Action thriller with Hayden Christensen and Adrien Brody. After serving time for a crime they both committed, one brother threatens to drag the other back into criminality.

programme.title: Ain't Them Bodies Saints
programme.desc: (2013) Doomed love story starring Rooney Mara and Casey Affleck. An outlaw escapes prison and sets out across the Texas hills to be with his wife and the daughter he's never met.

programme.title: Jack Hunter And The Star Of Heaven
programme.desc: (2008) Action starring Ivan Sergei. When archaeologist Jack Hunter's mentor is killed, he must find the culprit and stop ancient treasure falling into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Hidden Truth
programme.desc: (2016) Intense thriller with Sarah Lind. After her brother is accused of murder, Jamie tries to clear his name, uncovering dark secrets and a killer who will do anything to get away with it...

programme.title: Killing Salazar
programme.desc: Six U.S. agents have to protect a key witness in a major drug case from being murdered by the drug dealers he is going to testify against. Starring Luke Goss and Steven Seagal (2016).

programme.title: Fatal Flatline
programme.desc: (2020) Thriller starring Julie McNiven. A grieving couple donates their dead daughter's organs. But the recipient of her heart exhibits a disturbing and sinister obsession.

programme.title: Lost Letter Mysteries
programme.desc: (2013) Cosy drama with Eric Mabius and Kristin Booth. A team of postal workers take it upon themselves to track the recipients of undelivered mail.

programme.title: Lost Letter Mysteries: Time To Start Livin'
programme.desc: (2014) Cosy drama with Eric Mabius and Kristin Booth. The Postables receive a letter from a young boy in imminent danger. Can they unravel the mystery and reach him in time?

programme.title: An Aurora Teagarden Mystery: Last Scene Alive
programme.desc: (2018) Crime mystery with Candace Cameron Bure and Lexa Doig. Crime buff Aurora discovers she's the inspiration for a new film. But the plot thickens when the actress playing her is killed...

programme.title: Snatched from Mommy
programme.desc: (2021) Heart-wrenching psychological thriller starring Chelsea Hobbs. When blogger Elizabeth's baby is kidnapped, she uncovers a betrayal that hits much closer to home than she realised.

programme.title: Framed By My Sister
programme.desc: (2021) Deadly drama with Scout Taylor-Compton. A pair of adopted twins are surprised to meet their triplet who was separated from them at birth, but three's a crowd - especially when one's a killer.

programme.title: What The Nanny Saw
programme.desc: (2021) Thriller with Revell Carpenter. When nanny Kimberly uncovers her employer's affair with a lady who later turns up dead, she dives into the couple's dark secrets, fearing she might be next.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Gnasher and Gnipper enter a dog show, regardless of Walter saying they don't have true talent. He wants Athena and Miss Mini Wuff to win, but Walter has just underestimated Gnasher's true capabilities. Followed by Grounded.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Mum has bought curtain material for the soon to be newly decorated kitchen, and asks Dad to look after it while she is out. However, Dad falls asleep and mistakenly agrees that Dennis can use it as a giant sail. When Dad realises that it has gone, he calls Dennis to bring it back, but unfortunately Dennis gets into a spot of bother with the colonel, who takes the curtain material off Dennis. In an attempt to steal it back, the garden being wrecked and the kitchen is left looking like a bombsite. Dennis, Gnasher and Dad have to clean up the whole kitchen and redecorate it in time for Mum returning. When Mum decides it is time to hang the new curtains, Dennis is about to get the curtain material, but Mum reveals that she has changed her mind and bought new curtains instead. Followed by 'Fangs for the Memories'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis, his friends and Walter's friends get marooned on a desert island when Dennis attempts to escape a boring field trip. Followed by Substitute Creecher

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis plays a prank on the citizens of Beanotown, causing them to evacuate, which causes trouble for Dennis later. Followed by 'No Place Like Home'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Gnasher and Gnipper enter a dog show, regardless of Walter saying they don't have true talent. He wants Athena and Miss Mini Wuff to win, but Walter has just underestimated Gnasher's true capabilities. Followed by Grounded.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Athena gets Gnasher envy when seeing a pampered version of Gnasher in a magazine and when she hears that Dennis owns an Abyssinian wire-haired tripe hound (Gnasher), she wants him. However, being an owner to Gnasher isn't all cracked up to be! Followed by 'Splash'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis gets a case of the hiccups from Mr. Har Har's can-o-giggles and is looking for a way to cure them ready for a film premier. Followed by Athena's Party

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: The garden is accidentaly wrecked when Dennis tries to give Gnasher a bath, so the gang have to fix the mess before Mum comes home. Followed by 'Run Rabbit Run'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis makes a line of practical jokes for Mr. Scrimp, called 'The Menace Collection.' However, Dennis soon learns that it will put Mr. Har Har out of business.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: The Way of Den-Do After Walter takes up origami as a martial art, Dennis scoffs and comes up with his own martial art, and so the two prepare to battle it out. Followed by 'Smelling of Roses'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Aliens Among Us After watching a film about an alien invasion, Dennis, Curly and Pie Face decide to make their own film. However, Walter stumbles across them filming, and he only sees the action, not the camera. Filming what he sees on his mobile phone, he runs to tell the whole of Beanotown about the alien invasion. As panic spreads, Dennis and his friends discover the chaos and decide to keep filming in order to help make the best of their own alien film. Meanwhile, Sergeant Slipper investigates the alien landing that Walter has seen, and discovers the truth—that the spaceship is a playhouse with glow sticks in it. Followed by 'Castle in the Air'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Great Outdoors Dennis and his pet dog, Gnasher, live by just one rule: Kids should make all the rules! Followed by Dance of the Seven Pies.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Game On To get his friends back from Walter's group, Dennis challenges Walter to a videogames battle. Followed by 'Fish Tale'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Attack of the Walterbot For a school project, Dennis and Walter both build robots. However, during an accident, both robots merge, causing Dennis and Walter to defend the school. Followed by 'No Joke.'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis V.I.P With one backstage pass for a Ratbucket gig, Dennis and his friends pass themselves off as Ratbucket, only for the real Ratbucket not to be able to play at his own concert. Followed by 60 second Dennis and 'Bad Dad'

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Rubber Bands and Paperclips After Dennis breaks his bike, Dad is unable to afford a new one, so Dennis convinces him to ask his boss for a raise. Unfortunately, Mr Scrimp reduces his wages instead. Dennis then trashes his house to convince Scrimp that his family are poor, so that Mr Scrimp will feel compelled to raise Dad's wages. Just as Scrimp has been taken in by Dennis' plan, Mum and Dad arrive home laden with shopping bags, resulting in Dad getting fired on the spot. Dennis resolves to get Dad his old job back by secretly causing chaos at his office. To restore order Scrimp rehires Dad, sealing the deal with a generous pay rise. Mum and Dad repair the house, but still don't have enough money to buy Dennis a new bike, instead it gets repaired with Dad's office rubber bands and paperclips. Followed by 60 Second Dennis and 'Dennis Hiccups'.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Breakout Believing Gnasher and Gnipper to be trapped in Beanotown Dog Pound, Dennis comes up with a plan to rescue his friends and bring them both home. Followed by more Dennis and Gnasher episodes.

programme.title: The Django Story
programme.desc: Legendary gunslinger Django is recounting some of his greatest adventures while sitting in a saloon.

programme.title: Rage at Dawn
programme.desc: A special agent from Chicago is sent out west to bring in the notorious Reno brothers.

programme.title: The Avenging Angel
programme.desc: Miles Utley, a skilled Mormon commando and bodyguard, is forced to go rogue while investigating a deadly scandal of assassination and land speculation. As danger mounts, he must confront his beliefs and decide where his true loyalties lie in a world of betrayal and faith.

programme.title: The Jackals
programme.desc: Bad bank robber falls in love with granddaughter of miner he and his men planned to rob of gold, has change of heart.

programme.title: A Few Bullets More
programme.desc: Billy starts as an innocent outlaw protecting his mother but soon becomes a ruthless killer. When love gives him hope for change, Pat Garrett, a fatherly friend, helps him try to turn his life around. Yet fate drags Billy back into violence, and Garrett is ultimately credited with his death.

programme.title: The Ballad of a Gunfighter
programme.desc: An outlaw and his partner feud over the same woman.

programme.title: Cattle Queen of Montana
programme.desc: Sierra Nevada Jones must fight a villainous rancher to regain the land that is rightfully hers.

programme.title: Silver Lode
programme.desc: In Silver Lode, Dan Ballard is arrested by 4 Marshals for murder and theft but he denies the charges and searches for the real culprit even as the townsfolk start abandoning him.

programme.title: Mackenzie's Raiders EP33-35
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: The White, the Yellow, and the Black
programme.desc: In the 19th century, when the Japanese Emperor sends a gift pony to the US President it gets stolen and ransomed by Indians but Sheriff Gideon aided by an inept Japanese servant offers to deliver the ransom.

programme.title: Damned Pistols of Dallas
programme.desc: Outlaw Fast Draw (Álvarez) assaults stagecoach with passengers Clay Stone (Beir), singer Katy Dior (Marandi) and gambler Fred Foster (Mathot), but Stone is ready to take revenge.

programme.title: Payment in Blood
programme.desc: In 1867 Texas, after the Civil War, Colonel Thomas Blake and his men refuse to surrender, raiding Yankee towns. Rumors swirl that Blake kills for pleasure, not the Confederacy, leading to large bounties for his capture. However, Blake seeks $200,000 that vanished during the war from Confederate coffers. He sends Chamaco Gonzales to track down the missing fortune, hidden in General Beauregard's strong box.

programme.title: Silent Thunder
programme.desc: With the help of two bank robbers, a US Marshal sets out to rescue five prostitutes who have been abducted by a gang of desert dwelling, otherworldly, monsters

programme.title: The Counterfeit Kid
programme.desc: Jack, a simple farmhand must get help from a group of wild misfits and find treasure before the outlaw he's been impersonating finds him.

programme.title: Dead Men Don't Count
programme.desc: Two gunmen ride into a town with a plan to collect a large unearned bounty but are caught up in the local war for land caused by the impending arrival of the railroad.
